title: Kirkland Signature Protein bar energy variety pack,
reviews: {"author": "Pug Dog owner", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Awesome Bars!", "content": "Oh boy, where do I even begin with these Kirkland signature protein bars? Let me just say that my taste buds are doing the macarena right now!First off, the texture is just right. It's chewy but not too much, and it's not like those other protein bars that taste like you're biting into gravel. These bars are softer than a baby's bottom and they are packed with flavor.Speaking of flavors, have you tried the chocolate brownie one? I don't even know how they did it, but it tastes like a legit brownie. I'm convinced there are tiny little chocolate fairies working tirelessly in the Kirkland factory to make these bars extra delicious.And let's not forget about the peanut butter flavor. It's like eating a spoonful of creamy peanut butter, minus the weird looks from your coworkers. Trust me, I've been there.But the best part? These bars have a jaw-dropping 21 grams of protein. That's more than enough to power through a workout or just power nap on your couch, whichever you prefer.Overall, these Kirkland signature protein bars deserve all five stars and a standing ovation. I just hope they don't raise the price because I might have to sell my soul to pay for them.", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2023", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Nicholas Harvey", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Kirkland Signature Protein bar", "content": "The bars are goo and satisfying. I would recommend them for the value and flavor. The only con if you want to call it that is the are sticky. They stick to the packaging and to your fingers.", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on March 11, 2024", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Debbie J", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Best flavored Protein bars; no aftertaste", "content": "I just began using protein bars because of a low serum protein. There are plenty of brands to try and many have a rather distasteful aftertaste. Kirtland\u2019s is better than most, but their bar texture is not the easiest to eat: chewy, hard, mud and grainy! But the taste is much better with no aftertaste. My least favorite is their Chocolate chip cookie dough:  Quest makes a better bar in that category. However, Kirtland\u2019s are my first choice if I run out and are a decent price at Costco. The one thing that became a problem with protein bars in general was constipation.", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2021", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "mary kate priest", "rating": "4.0 ", "title": "Good flavor/Numbers", "content": "A little chewy, but the numbers on them are good, beating out my usual, Pure Protein brand. These are lower in sugar. Definitely cheaper at Costco, but in a jam... shop out a cheap source on Amazon.", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Liam Bennett", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Great low cost protein and fiber bar for hiking, golfing, and everyday life.", "content": "Perfect low cost source of protein and fiber. I have had trouble figuring out healthy, gluten free alternatives that don\u2019t make my stomach hurt and these work great. I really enjoy the cookie dough flavor, the REAL chocolate chips make them taste like cookies. I throw them everywhere from my everyday laptop bag to my golf bag. Love this product!!", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2022", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Xero Requiem", "rating": "1.0 ", "title": "Recommend staying away from both flavors for the slim per bar savings.", "content": "I bought these as a possible replacement to quest bars due to how many I eat(1-2 per day). The flavor varieties are limited to just these two, but the cost savings depending on where you buy your quest bars can be in the range of $0.60 to $1+ per bar.I tried both bars today. The brownie one is flat out horrible. 0/5 if I could. The flavor profile reminds me of cheap chocolate, and actually trying to eat the bar is essentially like chewing gum. After about chewing my first bite of the bar for about 30 seconds I spit it out and moved onto the next one.The chocolate cookie dough one is subpar at best. Might be worth a 1.5-2/5. I was actually able to chew and swallow my bite of this one, but rather than tasting like cookie dough, or even like a cookie dough imitation, which is what the somewhat okay quest bar version does for this flavor, it instead tastes like it is instead trying to mimic the flavor of something trying to mimic the flavor of cookie dough. So what you end up with is a worse version of the quest bar version of this flavor which is already only alright in its own right, and is one of their weakest bars in their lineup.In the end, someone at Kirkland decided it would be a good idea to take two of the worst quest bar flavors, and then make even cheaper versions of them, which in the end is reflected by the barely palatable taste of each. I wouldn't recommend anyone buying these. I'll try to see if someone I know likes them as maybe they wouldn't mind taking 18 free protein bars.In the end the only way these compare to the quest bars, is in their macro nutrient counts. In the end though, I signed up for 5 boxes of quest bars a month until I get a decent stock pile so I can take advantage of the 15% discount. That puts my price at $20-$21 per box or $1.75 per quest bar compared to ~$1.35 per bar for these. It is well worth the extra $0.40 per bar so I am not revolted by what I am eating and can actually enjoy the product I am paying for.", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2017", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Cindy from MN", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "great flavor", "content": "these bars keep you full for four hours.  it takes six hours before you really know you are hungry.  great for diets and summer activity", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2023", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "HRPuckinfutz", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Doesn't Give Me Gas", "content": "These protein bars are the only ones that don't give me gas. If you are embarrassed about passing gas while doing sit-ups in the gym, these are the perfect protein bar. They taste good, too, except for the peanut butter ones. I love peanut butter, but those don't taste great.The price is inflated. It is cheaper to purchase these from Costco, but they don't ship overseas.I have had an issue on occasion where the inside plastic film of the wrapper separated from the foil and stuck to the bar. The first time this happened I didn't notice until I had eaten three quarters of the bar. Let's just say that the plastic film didn't pass well. A few other times that happened I simply peeled the plastic film from the bar.Buy these at COSTCO if you can and save yourself about $10 a box.", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2020", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Amazon Customer", "rating": "2.0 ", "title": null, "content": "This new recipe does not play well with my stomach!  I've heard the same from several people.  Beware.", "date": "Reviewed in Canada on March 7, 2019", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Heather Floyd", "rating": "1.0 ", "title": null, "content": "These bars taste quite good and the net carbs work out well.  However, be very aware that these will very likely give you intestinal upset, bloating and intestinal gas.  It is quite significant and if at work or at a social outing they would cause great distress.  If you google this concern, you will read about similar reviews and they chalk it up to the presence of inulin in the product?", "date": "Reviewed in Canada on June 8, 2019", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Hardy", "rating": "2.0 ", "title": null, "content": "I was super excited to try this. But when i opened up the package of the bar, it looks like scary ass zombie thing! I was like alright i cant judge it by the looks so i took a bite. i was Surprised !!!! It taste like its made from chalk and mashed up cardborad boxes! on the bright side it has no sugar! so if you are into that then yeah go for it!", "date": "Reviewed in Canada on June 20, 2019", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "sara lloyd", "rating": "1.0 ", "title": null, "content": "I have bought this brand before from the store and they were delicious. Thought these would be the exact same but they are not! They must be old or maybe they were melted at some point but the texture, colour and taste is off. You can barely peal them out of the wrapper cause it's all stuck to it. They are gross! I guess that's why they are cheaper here than in store. I definitely don't recommend you purchase these!", "date": "Reviewed in Canada on March 26, 2019", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Dedilus", "rating": "1.0 ", "title": null, "content": "Absolutely rock hard , looked previously melted .Waste of 42 dollars , now I see they are on sale for 33 no kidding judt got them todayShameful to sell them.Can barely bite into them", "date": "Reviewed in Canada on March 5, 2019", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}

title: Pure Protein Bars, High Protein, Nutritious Snacks to Support Energy, Low Sugar, Gluten Free, Chocolate Deluxe, 6 Count (Pack of 2)
description: About this item    Two 6 count boxes of Pure Protein Chocolate Deluxe Protein Bars    These protein snack bars offer delicious chocolate flavor with every bite    Gluten free Pure Protein bars contain 21 grams of protein, 180 calories, and 3 grams of sugar    Protein bars with whey protein isolate support lean muscle and strength, as well as an active lifestyle    Enjoy these low sugar (1) protein bars as a convenient protein snack
ingredients: Protein Blend , Coating , Calcium Carbonate, Soy Lecithin, Natural Flavors, Sucralose), Hydrolyzed Collagen, Glycerin, Cocoa Powder, Water, Milk Protein Isolate, Milk Chocolate Drops , Maltitol Syrup, Peanut Flour, Calcium Carbonate, Natural Flavor, Vitamin and Mineral Blend , Sucralose, Almond Butter, Wheat Germ, Soy Lecithin.
reviews: {"author": "Sandra K. Cobb", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Why is it so hard to send two boxes?", "content": "I love these bars.  They taste good and they aren't too sweet.  They work well for a snack or a small breakfast.  I have  a subscribe and save subscription so that I can receive the delivery every month.  There has only been one month that the order was correct and by that I mean, I received two boxes of six just one time.  The other times, I only got one box of six.  I've had to contact Amazon every month and they either give me a refund or ship another box. One time, they gave me a refund so I could reorder and the reorder was wrong too.  I only got one box.  If two boxes get delivered, it is a good value for something that tastes good and is enjoyed by my family.  I am giving up because I just can't keep doing this every month.", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2021", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Amazon Customer", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "both my wife and I like them", "content": "Tastes good.  Wife and I eat them.  Taking on a trip to stave off hunger.", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2023", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "The Lazer Viking", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Best protein : calorie ratio I have found, and a great price too!", "content": "I have tried various protein bars to boost my muscle growth post-workout. I really hate protein powders. They just don't taste good with water, and I can't drink milk so it really limis my options to get the protein I need.Pure protein bars don't have the highest overall protein out of all the bars out there. You will easily find other bars with 30+ grams of protein. However, many of those bars easily have twice as many calories, and as I am trying to lose weight overall while gaining lean muscle mass, I don't really care for 350, 400 calorie protein bars. Most Pure Protein bars have 200 calories or less, while chocolate deluxe only has 180. I think Quest bars are comparable but they don't taste nearly as good (if you think Pure Protein bars are a little chalky, Quest tastes like straight up chocolate chalk) and I have heard horror stories of finding actual debris in those bars. They also cost more.No low calorie low sugar protein bar is going to taste like a special k or other brand bar that isn't specifically formulated for high protein / low calories. But these don't taste bad at all, considering. If you factor in the great price, I don't think you can go wrong if you're looking for a protein bar that maximizes the available protein while keeping calories low.", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on May 9, 2017", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Mansoor Ahmed", "rating": "4.0 ", "title": "Good Bar, Good Source of Protein in a snack", "content": "For those of you who has acquired some knowledge on protein diet to lose weight or gain muscle, please know that this is ONLY A SUPPLEMENT - NOT FOOD PROTEIN. If you really want the purest form of protein, eat egg whites or lean meat (Chicken/Turkey Breast, Beef, etc).Ok, that being said, you cannot carry eggs around, that's where this bar comes into picture. It has excellent amount of protein (20g) and low carbohydrate. It tastes absolutely delicious. I have always used (about 4-5 bars in a week) DeTour and Myoplex Protein bars. Detour has about 30g and Myoplex has about 25g of protein but their carb content is higher as well, and so is the calories. I am trying to lose weight, so I am watching both proteins and carbs, also doing cardio 5 times a week. I am not a nutritionist, but I am pretty sure the contents of these protein bars contain mono-saturated fats, which is not so good for our health. So, limit the use of these products as much as you can. Also, it has whey and sugar alcohols (sugar replacement), which can upset stomach for some people. I had that trouble with Detour but got used to it. The important thing is that you drink atleast 8 fl oz of water while taking this. Also, please limit your intake of these bars to 1 per day due to sugar alcohol presence.Recently, I have done a lot of research and it's best to eat whole grains and vegatables/lean meat to lose weight, instead of taking supplements. Good luck to you all, I think these 12 bars will last me atleast 3 weeks.I took one star off just because I do not want to encourage myself or anyone else to get addicted to these bars. Otherwise, it tastes just like a chocolate.", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2010", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Brightsunshine", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Longtime Best Bars on the market", "content": "I have tried a lot of different protein bars in my day and I have found that these are the best all around. I first heard about them from my doctor in 2020 and I've enjoyed them since that time. The taste is good, meaning, not bad at all. They come in a variety of flavors....deluxe chocolate is my favorite with strawberry yogurt coming in at a close second. Birthday Cake is the newest one. Pure Protein bars stand up against the competition and always comes in first or second. The ingredients are quality. The amont of protein is more than adequate considering what others have available. The price is very competitive, not expensive at all. I like them for a morning or afternoon snack. Hope you try them soon, you may be pleasantly surprised.", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2020", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Amazon Customer", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Nutritionally and Tastefully Perfect", "content": "Honestly, when I have a protein bar, I'm not looking for taste. I just want something that will get my protein intake up. That said though, the Pure Protein bars taste great (I've had the chocolate, cookie, and s'mores flavors). On top of that, you get 20g protein, 17g carbs, and not too much fat. Lots of protein bars are loaded up with saturated fats which is something you really have to look out for (these bars have only 3g saturated fat). Another thing you should look out for is that a lot of protein bars are loaded up with sugar whereas the Pure Protein bars have almost none. Just as a note, large amounts of sugar are good if you are having the bar right after a workout because the high glycemic index sugars replenish your body's glycogen levels quickly, but if you're having the bar any other time of day you don't want a lot of sugar (you should be having your protein in liquid form after a workout anyway). I've looked at lots of nutrition labels for protein bars and these definitely are the best and they also taste great. Highly recommended.", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2011", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Carina Penza", "rating": "1.0 ", "title": "I paid for 2 boxes but only got 1", "content": "It was supposed to be 2 boxes of 6 counts and I only received one. I paid full price.", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on March 10, 2024", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Sreekar", "rating": "1.0 ", "title": null, "content": "I\u2019ve had whey protein that tastes good and in multiple forms (shakes, bars, etc) but I\u2019ve gotta admit none of them tasted quite as bad as this. It starts off ok - the first bite tastes good and you think you\u2019ll finish the bar thoroughly satisfied having gotten your complement of protein. Yet when you do actually chew and swallow that first bite, you\u2019re left wondering how you\u2019ll go through all the 12 bars. The taste is really awful after a few chews and the after taste is downright disgusting. I\u2019m hoping to find myself in situations where I\u2019m properly famished  - so much so that I find an excuse to put another of these bars in my mouth and get my moneys worth", "date": "Reviewed in Singapore on February 3, 2020", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}

title: Glico Pocky Chocolate Sticks, 1.41 Oz
description: About this item    Chocolate Cream Covered Biscuit Sticks    Great for snacks, lunch boxes, quick energy pick me ups and treats!
ingredients: 'WHEAT FLOUR, SUGAR, CHOCOLATE LIQUOR, BLEND OF VEGETABLE OIL, , WHOLE MILK POWDER, PALM OIL SHORTENING, CONTAINS 1 PERCENT OR LESS OF: COCOA BUTTER, SALT, ARTIFICIAL FLAVORS, YEAST, LECITHIN, POLYGLYCEROL, POLYRICINOLEATE, LEAVENING , MONOGLYCERIDE, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, PAPAIN.'
reviews: {"author": "Donuts", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Great tasting snack...if you get the Japanese Pocky", "content": "I bought these back in January and never got around to reviewing them. I had heard many people rave about a Japanese snack called Pocky so I figured I would try it out. Just like the description states, its a biscuit stick covered in chocolate. I wouldn't say the taste is mind boggling but its very easy to eat and virtually no mess, well, as long as the chocolate doesn't melt. Anyways, in case anyone is wondering, I ordered from a seller named Very asia (amazon.com/gp/help/seller/at-a-glance.html?ie=UTF8&isAmazonFulfilled=0&orderID=103-7071944-5595443&marketplaceSeller=1&seller=A3JW437I54SEI1). I believe it took around a 3 weeks to actually get to me (maybe it had to be imported) but when it did, it came well packed and not damaged whatsoever. I'm definitely considering re-stocking on this in the future if I can't find a local storeEDIT: Oct 11, 2012*****Inquire the type of pocky from seller before finalizing purchase*****So I decided to restock after I couldn't fight the craving anymore. Unfortunately the batch this time was not so good (ordered from different seller because it was cheaper and through Amazon Prime). What I received was not the picture shown on the front page (2 per pack japanese pocky), it was a 1 per pack pocky~ish thing from Thailand. In my opinion, the 1 giant pack compared to 2 smaller packs is definitely a step back. Packaging was fine and I ordered in October when the weather was a bit cooler aka no melted chocolate arriving at the front door. The sticks were coated in some type of thick chocolate that was a bit bitter to the taste, more similar to dark chocolate than milk chocolate. The original Japanese pocky melted almost immediately in your mouth, this one melts slowly as it sits in your mouth.Personally I like the taste of dark chocolate but not when used here as a pocky flavor. I also have terrible self control so I buy things that come in small portions in order to a) not eat everything at once and b) avoid making the fridge a mess by cluttering it with tons of opened items. I can honestly say that I won't be overeating when it comes to this batch of pocky because I and my stomach dislike it so much. I won't change my original rating because that still holds true for the Japanese pocky but if I were to rate only the Thailand pocky it would be a 3. The taste isn't \"terrible\" but its definitely not to my liking. If possible I will be uploading some pictures of what I received.", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2011", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Aunt B", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Tasty Snack, Suggest not ordering in Summer Time", "content": "Tasty crunchy biscuit stick.  Not bitter, not too sweet.  Really like this single serving of Pocky.  The package says \"Chocolate Cream\" but it tastes more like dark chocolate to me (yum!)I see that others are disappointed with the portion of the product.  Please look at the images and Product Description before ordering to ensure you are getting what you want. I can only find these single serving boxes at one place that is about 40 miles away from my home.  It is convenient and awesome that I can shop at Amazon.com and find this treat at about the same price as at that store of mine (at time of writing this is $1.02 here at Amazon).The packaging at the time of this writing is a single serving which is 24 sticks. The box has a scored top so you can pull the cardboard back and have a container to hold the sticks in (see photo).  Tear the top of the sealed mylar  bag and the biscuit part is presented with the chocolate side down so you only need to touch the biscuit. [I added pictures in the Customer Images of the product]If you never had Pocky before, give them a try!!!  However, I warn you to consider the outside temperatures before ordering any chocolate products online.  I did not consider it as I ordered a couple boxes for myself (in Texas) and sent a few to a friend of mine in Idaho in the month of July.  I just did not think about it.  It was discouraging to learn my friend, who never tried Pocky, was met with a package of biscuit sticks that were melted together and has to eat them in broken pieces as they bust when she tries to pull them apart (the chocolate firmed up on her).  She still said she likes them, said the taste is great.At my house, my packages are also melted together; however, the chocolate is still soft as well... my house is about 80 degrees at the moment.  I can pull mine apart with a bit of a mess as the chocolate does as chocolate will do.  I don't mind too much as I get to lick my fingers off and feel like a little kid once more (awesome right?!?!).  But it isn't any sort of treat to give to a guest as the presentation is well... messy.  Unless that is cool with your guests then Go For It!!!!!That being said, I think this product is great if you like a bit of dark chocolate with a light, crispy biscuit.", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2014", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "M. Thompson", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "I love this snack!", "content": "I'm not sure how you review something that's as subjective as taste, but suffice to say that if you like chocolate and graham cracker, you'll like this (it doesn't taste exactly like either of those, but that's the closest analogy for me).  The sticks themselves are a cracker of some kind, dipped in chocolate, with one end left just normal cracker to you don't get your fingers covered in chocolate while eating.Here's some of the nitty gritty details - each of the boxes contain two individually sealed packets, that contain probably 20 or so of the sticks.  The packets themselves are really cleverly designed, with a little slit cut in the folded part, you just grab both sides and pull, and it opens up the package without any hassle - gotta love Japanese product design!  :)  Another nice design touch is that when you open it properly the grabbing-side of the stick is right at the top.Each of the packets has 210 calories (90 from fat), and about 80mg of sodium - so in terms of snacks this is a pretty good option.  It does contain milk, wheat, soybeans and sheanut - so if any of these are an issue for you, then you'll want to pass.  It also says on the packaging that the facility they're manufactured in also processes eggs and peanuts - the product doesn't use either of them, but the disclosure is nice if you're particularly sensitive to either.Overall a great snack at a great price - the 10 pack really is 20 of the packets, so that's quite a few snacks.  One note, if you live in a hot climate, don't order them in the summer because they will melt together (in shipping)!  Duh!  :)", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2010", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "lyn hoult", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": null, "content": "daughter loves them and good value of price", "date": "Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 28, 2017", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "carole", "rating": "2.0 ", "title": null, "content": "I bought a box of the Pocky and realised it said chocolate flavour, so it's not chocolate so I ordered a different box saying chocolate cream covered.  same Pocky came again chocolate flavour I agree with the others these were stuck together.  Not the usual Pocky we have bought from shops or comic conventions.", "date": "Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 26, 2021", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Ariel", "rating": "3.0 ", "title": null, "content": "Product doesn't look the same as the picture. It's from Thailand not Japan. either.", "date": "Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 18, 2019", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "a j horton", "rating": "2.0 ", "title": null, "content": "Unfortunately they arrived all melted into each other. A disappointing Christmas present.", "date": "Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 2, 2021", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "disco", "rating": "3.0 ", "title": null, "content": "Chocolate is slightly different and not as good as it tasted when we had it in Japan.", "date": "Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 13, 2018", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}

Kit Kats have always ben one of my favorites.  As far as the condition when it arrived, not so great.  When I saw it would be shipped with ice packs, I didn't think there would be a problem, I was wrong.  It was shipped UPS second day, it had two big ice packs in the package, these were not only COMPLETELY melted, they were warm to the touch and all of the mini bars were COMPLETELY melted in the little wrappers. You might think, \"oh just put it in the refrigerator\", which I did, but the chocolate had settled into the pleats and corners in the wrappers and once it hardened again and you try to open one, little pieces of chocolate fall out all over the floor or wherever, so you have to open them over a plate or the sink.  What a pain.  I don't really know how to solve this, maybe just not sell chocolate in the heat of Summer or ship it overnight.", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2019", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Cathy", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Delicious, and Plenty in the Bag!", "content": "The size if these bars does not mean a cut in their full-bodied flavor. Yes, they last a while.  One of my favorites!  Cathy", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2020", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "The earring so nice", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": null, "content": "Great buy", "date": "Reviewed in Singapore on March 2, 2023", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}

title: Original Crispy Seaweed Snacks by Nora | Low-Carb Asian Snack | Vegan, Gluten-Free, Non-GMO Verified | 6-Pack
description: About this item    SEAWEED SNACK Delicate but satisfying, Nora Crispy Seaweed will send your tongue spinning. Crispy and crunchy like a potato chip, yet low-carb and gluten-free, Original Crispy Seaweed is the ultimate guilt-free snack with just 3g carbs per serving! Pack of 6.    SUSHI ON-THE-GO Sushi, and other Asian cuisines, have long been foodie-favorites, and now you can grab our Nora Crispy Seaweed and enjoy that bold umami flavor on-the-go! Savor our light, crispy and flavorful vegan snack-you’ll keep coming back for more!    HEALTHY & SUSTAINABLE SNACK Did you know seaweed is one of the most nutrient dense vegetables on the planet, high in vitamins A, B6, and B12, as well as protein, iron, and fiber, and also one of the world’s most sustainable crops? Vegan snack is fully renewable - and delicious!    PREMIUM INGREDIENTS For thousands of years, Korean families have been harvesting seaweed, so we leave it to the experts! At Nora, we source our nori from farms in Korea, selecting only the finest, high-quality product available. Made with Rice Bran oil, a heart-healthy oil with 0g Trans-fat.    OUR STORY The simple truth is, we at Nora just love to eat seaweed snacks! So, we decided to share all this umami goodness with the world’s most discriminating and adventurous snackers - you! One taste and we think your taste buds will agree that Nora is like a trip through Asia, no passport required.

title: Nature's Turn Freeze-Dried Fruit Snacks, Superfruit Variety, Pack of 8 (0.53 oz Each)
description: About this item    This variety pack contains one of each flavor, including Strawberry, Blueberry, Raspberry, Apple, Peach, Pineapple, Mango and Dragon fruit    Freshest, ripest, non-gmo, 100% fruit snacks, healthy and safe plant-based treat    With tons of delicious flavors to choose from, there’s an easy, anytime snack for every palate    Our freeze-dried fruit crisps are perfect for snacking on their own, but are also great for baking, adding color to your favorite dessert and so much more    Our products are made with no sugar added, no corn syrup, no additives, non gmo, no dyes, gluten free, peanuts, eggs and dairy free and nothing artificial. Our fruit is freeze-dried, a gentle dehydration process that removes over 90% of the water within a fruit or vegetable while retaining most of the color, flavor, and nutrients you’d expect from fresh fruit.
ingredients: Strawberries, Raspberries, Blueberries, Mangos, Pineapples, Apples, Peach, Dragon fruit
reviews: {"author": "Amazon Customer", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Delicious and healthy", "content": "I was looking for a healthy snack for my toddler and was having a difficult time finding choices that were free of additives, and all types of terrible things. They are flavorful and there are a lot of strawberries in the bags. I just wish that the bag were resealable, as my toddler doesn\u2019t eat all of the strawberries in one sitting. I have to awkwardly fold the bag over and put it in a Ziploc bag, and then humidity starts to get to them, and they get a little squishy. I mix it with raisins and nuts to make a kind of trail mix", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Wake", "rating": "3.0 ", "title": "Annie's...baby...this isn't it.", "content": "So, I picked up Annie's Organic White Cheddar Squares thinking I was about to embark on a taste adventure. Spoiler alert: it was more like a snack vacation with a layover in Blahsville.First off, I have no idea who's in charge of the crunch factor over at Annie's, but we might need to have a chat. These squares were less \"snap, crackle, pop\" and more like a casual stroll through a library \u2013 quiet, but not in a good way. I was expecting a snappy texture, but these squares were more chill than my grandma's Sunday afternoon crossword session.Now, let's chat about the flavor, or should I say the MIA flavor? Organic white cheddar sounds fancy, right? Well, these squares made me question my taste buds. I was looking for a cheese explosion, but it was more like a cheese murmur. I mean, come on, Annie! Where's the cheese party you promised?And can we talk about the uniformity? These squares are so perfectly shaped; I feel like I'm snacking on cheese-flavored graph paper. I miss the days when snack crackers had character, you know, like they'd been through a wild party in the snack factory.Look, Annie's, I love your commitment to being all organic and stuff, but let's not forget the snack part of the snack. Next time, maybe add a little more cheese and a sprinkle of snack rebellion. Until then, my taste buds are on vacation, and they didn't even send a postcard from Flavor City.", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "robby tharp", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "great healthy crackers", "content": "Really happy with these crackers. Wish they didn't come in a big bucket, huge waste of plastic.", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2023", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "KL", "rating": "3.0 ", "title": "This is jello in a tube, not candy", "content": "I bought this container of Japanese \"candy\" as a gift to my niece who LOVES all things Japanese. I received the item the day after I ordered it, so shipping was FOR SURE on point. The container, packaging, and flavor  assortment was also great, I just wasn't expecting jello. I initially wasn't going to open the container, but considering this is part of her birthday gifts, I decided to check the quality before putting it in the mail to her. Upon opening one of the \"candies\" some of the juice popped out which ran down my hands. Not a huge deal. I then tasted it and it's TOTALLY jello. Same consistency, same taste, same gelatinous texture. Not at all what I was expecting. I paid $11 and change for a container of plastic straws filled with jello. Jello is typically super cheap so I'm disappointed. I decided to take a 2nd one out of the container and throw it in the freezer to see what it turns out like. If they're better frozen, I still plan to send it to my niece with a note attached to her to put the container in the freezer and enjoy them frozen. The one I had didn't taste bad. Was sort of a tropical flavor. Still though, I was hoping for Japanese CANDY.... not boring jello.", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2021", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "unusual22", "rating": "1.0 ", "title": "\ud83e\udd2ePlease don\u2019t buy these jelly's", "content": "I think I will never eat jelly again. They taste sweet but are actually low glycemic because the protein plus fat content equals or is less than the carb content. I think they'd be even better with fewer carbs. Has a nice bite feel with a little crunch and not too chewy like other bars.  solid taste.  it is on the sweeter side, 17g sugar.  But a great way to get a quick \"meal\" in.  SatiateWould recommend and I will be subscribing to this one.", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Lauren R.", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Tastiest Protein-Packed Bar on the Market.", "content": "These Builder's Bars are the tastiest protein bars I've ever tried, and I've tried MANY different brands since my Gastric Bypass Surgery.  As an added benefit, they are low in calories comparative to similar products with 290 per bar.  I get the Chocolate Peanut Butter kind, because I'm a chocolate addict and you can't go wrong with peanut butter.  I've read a bunch of reviews for other chocolate protein bars before purchasing and have found them to be shameful as when I received the product, the chocolate didn't even taste like REAL chocolate!  These bars aren't to the quality of the finest chocolatiers, but for only 290 calories, it tastes as good as Hershey's chocolate.  These are definitely my new go-to snack for that afternoon slump!", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2022", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Ret9580", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Good morning energy", "content": "Bought these for a little over $15 for a package of 12 (I see the price has gone up since).  I personally like the taste, but the calories are a little on the high side (290 per bar).  I take a few bites every mile on my 6-8 mile walk/jog every morning. I like that they have high protein. The flavor is good if you want a candy bar- but it\u2019s big so after about half of the bar I could barely finish. However I do like that they are bigger and more filling. This is still my favorite of the higher protein bars I\u2019ve tried. Good texture. I just wish it weren\u2019t so cloyingly sweet.", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}

Whether it's for parties, movie nights, or simply indulging in a sweet treat, this candy is a crowd-pleaser that never disappoints.The resealable boxes ensure that the candy stays fresh and retains its softness, even after opening. It's a thoughtful feature that allows me to enjoy the candies over time without worrying about them going stale.In conclusion, SOUR PATCH KIDS Original Soft & Chewy Candy is a delightful treat that brings joy and nostalgia with each bite. The perfect blend of sweet and sour flavors, coupled with the convenience of individual boxes, makes it a must-have for candy lovers of all ages. Whether you're satisfying a sweet tooth or looking to share some fun moments with friends and family, this candy is the ultimate choice. I highly recommend it to anyone seeking a burst of sweet and sour excitement in a convenient and delicious package!", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2023", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "NoeHive", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Delicious. Great size to share with friends, good flavor and they were gigantic so it was great!", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on February 23, 2024", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Monique", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "One of my favorite candies", "content": "The Family Size packaging is perfect for sharing and indulging with loved ones. With a generous quantity of candies, it's ideal for gatherings, movie nights, or simply satisfying a sweet tooth over an extended period.The soft and chewy texture of these candies is a major highlight. They offer a satisfying bite that's not too hard or too soft, striking the perfect balance between chewiness and flavor release. Each candy delivers an initial burst of sweetness followed by a tangy kick that keeps me coming back for more.The assortment of flavors in each bag adds an element of excitement to every bite. From the classic sour flavors to the fruit-inspired ones, the variety ensures that there's something for everyone to enjoy. It's a fun and flavorful journey with each candy.The resealable packaging is a practical feature that helps maintain the freshness of the candies. This means that I can enjoy a handful and seal the bag for later without worrying about the candy becoming stale or losing its signature texture.The nostalgic appeal of SOUR PATCH KIDS is undeniable. I've tried others, such as Motts, but I find them too sugary. This brand is the most natural tasting - only 3 ingredients (apples, apple puree, and lemon juice). Its not too sugary, but not bland. I find that the regular and cinimon flavors are best for me sugar wise. I am autistic, and have a lot of sensory issues re: food and food texture. This is my go to safe food. Its super easy to consume in the morning (when its the hardest for me to stomach food); I love throwing one in my purse for a snack later on. The texture is not as smooth as Motts - I like that it has more of the applesauce puree chunks (not actual chunks). Finally, it doesn't upset my stomach. title: POPCORNERS Sea Salt Popped Corn Snacks, Gluten Free, Non-GMO, Single-Serve 1oz bags (Pack of 40)
description: About this item    CONTAINS: 40 - 1 oz snack packs of crunchy and wholesome popped-corn chip snacks: Sea Salt    WHOLESOME SNACKS: PopCorner's delicious popped corn snacks are drizzled in sunflower oil with a pinch of sea salt, our chips are made with non-GMO corn and never fried, are gluten-free, and nut-free. Just simple ingredients for better flavor!    SIMPLE INGREDIENTS: Made with only three ingredients, and no artificial flavors, colors, or preservatives- PopCorner's Sea Salt Contains just 3 ingredients: Yellow Corn, sunflower oil & sea salt    TESTED AND TRUE: Non GMO Project Verified, Gluten Free, Kosher, Nut Free & Vegan - a good alternative to fruit snacks    Convenient on-the-go snacks great for a busy lifestyle, at work, kids' lunch snacks and much more
ingredients: Yellow Corn ,Sunflower Oil, Sea Salt.
reviews: {"author": "Libby", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Tasty....and only three ingredients: corn, oil and salt!", "content": "In the convenience food category, these are the best combination of healthy snack and tasty snack that I've found.  They have just 3 ingredients: yellow corn, sunflower oil and sea salt.  In one bag (one portion per 1.1 oz bag, which is more than you'd think) there is only 6 grams of fat and 135 mg of sodium.  If you've been looking at nutrition labels you'll know this is great.  And very importantly, they're delicious.  They taste very much like popcorn made into a chip.  The sea salt is my favorite because it has the fewest ingredients (healthiest)and has that pure popcorn taste without the addition of artificial flavors.  The box of 40 sells for 17.14 (you can't beat Amazon!)which comes to about 43 cents per bag. I first discovered these at Costco and bought a big box of the individual bags without knowing what I was getting.....hoping to discover a tasty healthier snack.  Since discovering them I haven't seen them available anywhere else except through Amazon.  Thanks Amazon for giving us a great product at a great price!!!", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2013", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Ken M", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Excellent snack at a good price.", "content": "This review is on the 'Sea Salt' flavor. For a serving size of a 1.1 ounce bag, the facts are: 3.5g fat, 0g trans fat, 0g saturated fat, 190mg sodium, 24g carbohydrate, 6% DV of iron. The ingredients: Yellow Corn, Sunflower Oil, Sea Salt.The date code on the bags I received was for 10 months onto the future, I have no worry about being able to finish them by that time.They are popped corn that has somehow been pressed into the shape of a fried corn chip. They are a little crisp mixed with the texture of popped corn, meaning they are not dry and as brittle as a corn chip. Medora did some kind of magic on the pressed chips to make them taste a bit like real corn chips. All in all, I was pleasantly surprised with the snack-ability, good job with that.I ate two bags of these and then placed an order for another 40 pack, of a different flavor. That is my endorsement.Enjoy.", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2013", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "M.NPR", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "PopCorners are poppin' with flavor", "content": "I saw these chips and had to buy them since I purchase Popchips by the case on a regular basis. I assumed these were the same except made with corn. I was right. They are delicious! I enjoy plain corn chips or plain multigrain chips and these too are plain and simple with lots of flavor. I don't think these need all the elaborate flavoring (i.e. Nacho cheese, spicy salsa, triple cheese, etc.). They are great for my kids lunch and a nice indulgence for me if I eat a sandwich for lunch. I highly recommend these.", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2010", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Joan M Searcy", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "YUM!", "content": "If you like popcorn and need to limit how many bowlfuls you devour at one sitting, this is a great product for you! These little bags have just the right amount of salty, crunchy popcorniliciousness and by getting an entire case, you have lots to enjoy, some to share, and plenty to take with you wherever you go. Best snack out there -- only 140 low-fat calories per bag, in 5 flavors.", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2014", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Willa", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Housewife", "content": "Our family loves this product, and my daughter likes it especially because she must eat gluten free foods, and this is good for her.  We have only been able to get this product at a rest stop on the turnpike, and was so glad to find it on the internet.I came back from vacation, and wanted to make another order, and I discovered that the price had doubled.  I was very disappointed  and if that is the case, I will not be ordering it again.We do love the popcorn taste and the seasalt makes it taste so good.  I would like to write to the company and see how to find out about the price of the 40 bags.", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2012", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Christie", "rating": "4.0 ", "title": "Natural, Healthy, tasty snack.", "content": "These were surprisingly good. I've tried the ever famous \"popchips\" which, although they were good, didn't seem as healthy as these.These have a few ingredients including corn, sunflower oil and sea salt. They are soft like popcorn all around. They still have a slight crunch like a tortilla chip, but after the initial crunch, it's like a piece of popcorn. The taste is authentic and very good! Just enough salt for the sea salt flavor.Highly recommend to anyone looking for a good snack to fill up time. 140 Calories in a bag, and not much else.Ordering the jalapeno to try, too.", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2014", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "NF1031", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Hooray a popcorn alternative for someone with digestive issues!", "content": "I had my large intestine removed and to avoid blockages I stay away from hard to digest foods and things with seeds including popcorn. I miss popcorn the most out of all the things I can't have. I also watch my gluten intake as it slows down digestion. I came across these chips and feel like I found my happy medium! These are light, easy to chew, have no seeds and taste alot like the flavor I am missing from my popcorn snacking! The subscribe and save is a great deal. I got a box full of these chips that will last me until my next delivery! Love these!", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2014", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "TY", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "The best salty snacks", "content": "These are my favorite salty snacks! I first encountered them on a JetBlue flight and immediately went searching for them. They have a delightful crunchy texture with the taste of popcorn. I've also tried the kettle corn flavor, which is okay, but the caramel was kind of weird and not for me.", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2013", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}

reviews: {"author": "Tim G.", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Review", "content": "These corn chips are excellent.  Fresh and crunchy.  And they were in good shape, not crushed.", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2024", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Murky", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Frito Bandito Hits Again!", "content": "I\u2019d recently tried a box of 40 1oz packages of Crispy Cheetos, an old favorite. Good experience, so I thought I\u2019d try some Fritos. I hadn\u2019t eaten them in years, but remembered them as being a simple tasty snack. Good price when you compare to a vending machine offering or a mixed bag of snacks from the grocery store. Delivery was prompt, The Amazon Order Chauffeur was polite as he handed me the box, covered by another package containing an order for my wife. When I got inside, I noticed the tape sealing the top of the box was a bit weathered-looking. Sadly, closer inspection revealed that it looked like the tape had been picked at like an old scab and slid away to allow access to the box. \u201cHeaven\u2019s to Murgatroid\u201d, I said to myself, as I slid the tape aside and accessed the contents as I suspected someone may have done before me.  I carefully removed the packages of Fritos, counting as I went. Thirty-nine, not forty. I counted again. 39/40ths of the delivery had survived the journey from Frito-lay to my door. I was crestfallen. A thief had intercepted my order of Fritos while it was in the hands of the manufacturer or the Amazon delivery system. My first thought was beneficial as I considered that maybe someone within the Fritos or Amazon empires was sadly hungry and perhaps wasn\u2019t able to provide for their spouse and children. If I\u2019d encountered them on the street while carrying a box of 40 packages of Fritos, I\u2019d without a doubt offer more than a single package to help them out. My second thought was less generous as I considered that the individual who took advantage of an opportunity to purloin a package of Fritos had done more than grab a quick snack. They\u2019d made me realize that I couldn\u2019t trust Amazon to deliver anything to my home without the fear that someone within the system could easily f*** with my order. Being a food product, it was clear that removing one of 40 packets was not all that could have occurred. I looked at my options. There didn\u2019t appear to be a way to complain other than to leave a review comment, which would probably be overlooked by many and read by few, most notably someone that I would typically consider eligible to hear a complaint. I could suck it up and just hope that the Frito Bandito hadn\u2019t left anything behind other than a disgruntled customer. The difference between receiving 40 or 39 bags of Fritos is in the fraction range, so it\u2019s not the cost. No, it\u2019s the principle! I decided to return the product. The packaging and the contents were both damaged by the Frito Bandito, meaning I didn\u2019t receive what I\u2019d ordered. I entered the complaint system and took a look at something new for me. I could get a refund or I could get a replacement. I considered the taste memory of a bag of Fritos. I\u2019ll go for the replacement, I thought. My wife had discovered that Amazon had made it easier to return things to Amazon, so I thought it would be easy to drop the fouled box of Fritos and wait for another. Here it is two days later and I have a fresh box of Fritos that hasn\u2019t been obviously intruded upon by the Frito Bandito or any other scalawags. I\u2019m feeling better. Frito-Lay said keep the original box, as well. That\u2019s very generous. I like that, but will probably donate it. It has restored my faith to a degree, though and I\u2019ll probably be ordering again. Sucks that you have to worry about the baditos though.", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2019", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Lori Lynn Langley", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Almost Expired", "content": "This is my first time to ever leave a negative comment. These chips were ordered July 9th, 2022 and received July 11th, 2022.  I did not open then as I was quarantined with COVID.  Opened today as we are using them for an event Saturday, August 6, 2022.  Found the chips haphazardly thrown in tbe boxes and that the expiration date on chips in one box is August 9, 2022 and the other August 23, 2022. No where in the description dud it say they would have such a short best usrd by date.  I am not happy about this at all!!  What if my event was to be in September or later, these would be EXPIRED!! I get it, they are ok but there are people who these could be served to that are not ok with date.  I feel like these are from busted boxes and you have had them a while.  Most chips have at least a 2 or 3 month or longer best used by date when purchased.  To late to return for replacement or refund, but wanted to let people know to order with caution and order with the date you plan to use in mind. Unhappy Customer!!", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2022", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Vicki ", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Fresh and SO delicious!", "content": "Arrived at our door yesterday, just in time for chili I made. title: KIND Protein MAX Sweet & Salty Caramel Peanut Crisp Snack Bars, Keto Friendly, 20g Protein, 12 Count
description: About this item    Contains one (1), 12 count box of KIND Protein MAX Sweet & Salty Caramel Peanut Crisp High Protein Bars    Enjoy the taste of delicious caramel, sea salt, and peanuts with our NEW KIND Protein MAX Protein Bar; snacks mindfully made with peanuts as the #1 ingredient    With 20g of protein these KIND Protein Max bars are perfect when you need a keto friendly, high protein snack with 0g added sugar* and 1g total sugar    KIND Protein MAX bars are a wholesome, tasty, and convenient way to include an excellent source of protein in your day    KIND high protein bars are high in fiber, Non-GMO Project Verified, gluten free, kosher, and contain no artificial sweeteners or sugar alcohols
reviews: {"author": "Quarter4Scale", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Tasty very tasty exactly 62g per bar", "content": "Writing this review as soon as I received my bars and took a bite. To me, they are very very tasty. Granted I haven't had a regular candy bar in years so I don't know what a regular bar really tastes like these days. And frankly, I won't enjoy a regular candy bar knowing I'll be eating junk and sugar that's bad for my health.  As far as protein bars go, I don't detect any aftertaste or anything weird whatsoever. They taste entirely normal to me and offer a perfect mix of saltiness and sweetness with that unique and unmistakable taste of peanuts. At one point, I really enjoyed Power Crunch peanut butter creme protein wafer bars but even those had an unmistakable artificial sweetener taste to them. These don't taste artificial at all so I do believe their claim that these don't contain any artificial sweeteners. I love love love these. Bye bye power Crunch. In fact, these are dangers to have around cuz I might eat too many at a time. They will be perfect for my international flight coming up. I suspect I won't be meeting my daily protein goals by just eating the meals provided by the airline.The only thing is , I'm pretty sure the peanut butter coating will melt if these bars are kept in a backpack/ container/ glove compartment in hot weather. In fact I think they'll melt even in room temperature in hot weather so best to keep them somewhere cool.", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on March 6, 2024", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Rob", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Great taste and incredible nutritional value", "content": "What isn't there to love? Gluten free, packed with protein, and tastes great! If you're calorie conscience and want to get a great amount of quick protein per calorie, you cannot go wrong here.", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on March 6, 2024", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "BarbInReno", "rating": "4.0 ", "title": "Kind Bars Sweet & Salty Caramel Peanut Crisp", "content": "Taste great. Good to take along on camping trips, hiking, fishing, or whatever you are doing. A little pick me up along the trail.This is not the best flavor of Kind Bars, but it will do.", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2024", "verified": "( "}; {"author": "bae", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Bit pricey but good, low sugar protein bar", "content": "These bars are a bit pricey for a box of 12, but they actually taste decent, and it's a pretty good low-sugar option.", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2024", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "SQUiD808", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Tasty", "content": "Yo these are super good idk how they did it", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on February 25, 2024", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "jorban", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Indulgent Flavor, Wholesome Ingredients", "content": "If you're like me, always on the lookout for a tasty snack that doesn't compromise on nutrition, then look no further than the KIND Protein MAX Sweet & Salty Caramel Peanut Crisp Snack Bars. These bars are a true joy, offering a delightful combination of flavor and wholesome ingredients that will satisfy your cravings without any guilt.First and foremost, let's talk about taste. These bars are an absolute treat for the taste buds, with a rich and indulgent flavor profile that makes them taste more like a decadent dessert than a protein-packed snack. The sweet and salty combination of caramel, sea salt, and peanuts is simply irresistible, offering a burst of deliciousness in every bite. It's hard to believe that something so delicious can also be so nutritious!What sets these bars apart is their thoughtful ingredient list. Peanuts take center stage as the #1 ingredient, providing a natural source of protein and a rich, nutty flavor that shines through with every bite. This focus on real, wholesome ingredients is truly refreshing, and it's evident from the first taste that these bars are made with care and attention to quality.In addition to being delicious, these bars are also nutritious. With 20g of protein per serving, they're the perfect snack for fueling up on the go or satisfying hunger between meals. Plus, they're keto-friendly, with low carbs and low sugar, making them an excellent option for those following a low-carb lifestyle. And with 0g of added sugar and just 1g of total sugar, you can enjoy them guilt-free, knowing that you're making a smart choice for your health.But it's not just about what's in these bars \u2013 it's also about what's not. If it was not necessary, KIND did not include it. They're gluten-free, kosher,  contain no sugar alcohols or artificial sweeteners and no GMOs, if those sorts of things matter to you. This means you can feel good about enjoying them, knowing that you're nourishing your body with wholesome, clean ingredients.In terms of convenience, these bars are amazing. Whether you're grabbing a quick snack on the go or fueling up for a busy day, they're the perfect option for busy lifestyles. They're portable, easy to stash in your bag or desk drawer, and ready to enjoy whenever hunger strikes. Plus, with their satisfying texture and indulgent flavor, they'll keep you satisfied and energized throughout the day.Overall, I can't recommend the KIND Protein MAX Sweet & Salty Caramel Peanut Crisp Snack Bars highly enough. They're delicious, nutritious, and convenient \u2013 everything you could want in a snack. Whether you're looking for a post-workout pick-me-up or a tasty treat to enjoy on the go, these bars have you covered. Treat yourself to the goodness of real ingredients and indulgent flavor with KIND Protein MAX bars \u2013 you won't be disappointed!", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024", "verified": "( "}; {"author": "KH99", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Excellent protein bars", "content": "I was surprised to find that, for a 12 pack box of bars, they're actually quite sizable. Each bar is, I would say, perhaps twice the size width-wise of an average granola bar and serves as a reasonably filling snack. In terms of flavor, KIND struck a good balance here. The peanuts and caramel are both definitely present, yet at a good balance so that neither of those flavors feels overpowering. The peanuts themselves also live up to the \"crisp,\" with each bite having an appreciable crunch to it.I'm also happy to say that, for protein bars that emphasize peanuts so much, I expected that they would be messier to eat, but the bars actually hold together very well even as you bite into them. As a side note, these are definitely fresh with a far off expiration date, so they'll keep in the cabinet for a good while. In my case, I ordered these in early February, and the listed expiration date is in December. That's plenty of time to eat 12 bars!", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024", "verified": "( "}; {"author": "Happy", "rating": "4.0 ", "title": "Sadly, Not For Me", "content": "These taste just fine and the absence of sugar is wonderful. Unfortunately, I've never tried this product before and had no idea how much fat and fiber are in a single bar. There's 23% saturated fat and 26% fiber content per bar. Using guidelines set by the American Heart Association, it doesn't seem healthy to consume more than one bar per day because of the saturated fat.I ate about 75% of one before reading the label. If you've had a cholecystectomy, like me, then you'll want to avoid this product unless you enjoy spending all night in a bathroom in absolute agony. It's going to be a fun evening for me. Some fat is fine and some fiber is also fine, but eating something high in both - generally over 10% - is going to cause some serious problems for some people. Even though this product isn't for me, I won't leave a low rating because it tastes great and has many nutritional benefits. Great for an on-the-go snack for health conscious and heart healthy people.", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024", "verified": "( "}

reviews: {"author": "Tom", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Fruit With Crunch", "content": "As an aficionado of dried fruit, I approached Bare Baked Crunchy Fruit Variety Pack with a blend of curiosity and expectation. Whether enjoyed as a standalone treat or incorporated into trail mixes and yogurt bowls, they elevate any snacking experience to new heights.Moreover, the convenience of the pack of 16 ensures that a burst of fruity goodness is always within arm's reach, whether at home, at the office, or on the go. reviews: {"author": "Kevin L", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "These Sour Cream and Onion Pringles were fresh and a good deal for the money.", "content": "Sometimes it's hard to find good deals on chips these days unless you buy a large bulk. I don't like to buy too much at one time because the chips will often go stale before I eat them all. I also don't like the current pricing for most chips on Amazon and in the locals stores here in 2023. I found this 1 dozen pack of Pringles sour cream Grab and Go size stacks for a great price. They were well under $1 per can and that is about 1/3 of the price for them in the local stores. I just ate my first can of them. They were fresh with an expiration date late in 2024. There were a few broken chips in the bottom of the cans from shipping but only a few. You always have to worry about that with pringles because they are notorious for having broken chips. Nothing worse than a canister of Pringles dust! So far these look great. These shipped fast and showed up fresh and in great condition. As far as sour cream and onion chips go, Pringles are on the milder end of the flavor spectrum. They have a mild sour cream and onion taste and are pretty mellow. To me they have less flavor than Lay's, Ruffles, or Utz sour cream and onion chips. That is a good thing to some people because some other brands might have too much sour cream or onion. I like them all. To me these seem less salty than Lay's or Ruffles which is a good thing.", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Jason G", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Excellent on the go snack", "content": "I enjoy having these for a quick snack on the go. Small but enough Pringles to fill up on. Easy to stack and store. Excellent flavor. They were very fresh too.", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2024", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "John", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Snacking Bliss in a Variety Pack!", "content": "The Pringles Potato Crisps Variety Pack is an absolute snack-time delight! With 16 conveniently sized cans, it's perfect for lunch breaks, office munchies, and keeping the kids satisfied on the go.What sets Pringles apart is their iconic shape and satisfying crunch. Each crisp is consistently delicious, and this variety pack offers a medley of flavors to please everyone's palate.From classic Original to tantalizing Sour Cream & Onion, there's something for everyone in this pack. The variety ensures you'll never get bored, and it's great for sharing or mixing and matching your favorite flavors.The grab-and-go convenience is a game-changer. These stackable cans are easy to carry, and their resealable lids keep your chips fresh for later. No more worrying about crushed chips at the bottom of your bag!Whether you're a seasoned Pringles enthusiast or trying them for the first time, this variety pack is a fantastic choice. It's also a cost-effective way to enjoy these iconic snacks.If I had to find a downside, it's the potential for overindulgence, as these chips are seriously addictive. Moderation is key!In summary, the Pringles Potato Crisps Variety Pack is a snack lover's dream come true. It offers convenience, variety, and that irresistible Pringles taste. Whether you're stocking up for the office, the kids, or just yourself, this pack is a winning choice. Snack away and enjoy!", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Jack Mawdsley", "rating": "4.0 ", "title": "Nice but arrived crushed", "content": "a lot of the cans content had been reduced to crumbs by the time of arrival.", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on March 2, 2024", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Jackie Torres", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Great for meal prep or on the go", "content": "yummy, size perfect and easy", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on February 27, 2024", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Jinx", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Rat size/snack size", "content": "Our little inmates just love them. title: ROYCE' Nama Chocolate "Champagne Pierre Mignon"
description: About this item    MAKE EVERY MOMENT SPECIAL: Truffle chocolate is synonymous with luxury chocolate. ROYCE' Nama Chocolate is characterized by its soft and silky smooth texture. The fresh cream from Hokkaido, Japan is what makes this extraordinary! Celebrate special moments with chocolates that are sure to impress!    INCREDIBLY LUSCIOUS CHOCOLATE: ROYCE' Nama Chocolate "Champagne Pierre Mignon" is a confection made with milk chocolate and fresh cream, and lightly infused with champagne. Pierre Mignon is highly regarded for its high quality and delicate aroma which blends well with our milk chocolate. It is the perfect treat for celebrating with friends and family!    BLISSFUL TREAT FOR YOURSELF: Experience a treat for the senses with exceptionally rich, creamy, and flavorful chocolates. Elegant and fruity, ROYCE' Nama Chocolate "Champagne Pierre Mignon" is the ideal treat for those who like the finer things in life. Indulge yourself after a long day or surprise your friends with this delicious chocolate treat from ROYCE'.    PERFECT FOR SHARING: Each box contains 20 pieces of chocolate. There may be enough to share, but we won’t blame you if there’s nothing left before guests can even take a seat.This melt-in-you-mouth chocolate will satisfy the chocolate cravings of a wife, husband, girlfriend, boyfriend, grandparent, friend, or work colleague.    HOW JAPAN DOES CHOCOLATE: ROYCE' Chocolate takes immense pride in producing our confections in Hokkaido, an agricultural capital and gourmet hub in Japan. Our credo is to create top-notch chocolate selections in Hokkaido using only the finest ingredients sourced both locally in Japan and internationally from different countries. We want to entice everyone's palate through the Japanese principles of excellence and detail-oriented craftsmanship.

title: Popcorner Kettle Corn Popped Corn Chips, 7 Ounce
description: About this item    Non-Gmo corn; no artificial anything; always gluten free; never ever fried    Non-Gmo; gluten free; vegan    A little rebellion now and then is a good thing - Thomas Jefferson    Stand up for better snacks, born in liberty, NY
ingredients: Yellow Corn; Sunflower Oil; Cane Sugar; Sea Salt
reviews: {"author": "Real Deal", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "A Crunchy and Flavorful Snack - Perfectly Salted Popcorners!", "content": "I recently tried Popcorners Sea Salt, and I must say, they are a delightful and addictive snack that satisfies both my crunch cravings and my love for savory flavors.The first thing that caught my attention was the inviting aroma of popcorn as I opened the bag. The sea salt seasoning provided a hint of anticipation for the burst of flavor that was about to come.In terms of taste, these Popcorners do not disappoint. The sea salt seasoning is perfectly balanced, enhancing the natural taste of the popped corn without overpowering it. Each triangular piece is generously coated with just the right amount of salt, making them a savory treat that's hard to put down.The crunchiness of these Popcorners is one of the highlights. They have a satisfying texture that's crisp and light, making them an enjoyable snack to munch on.I appreciate that Popcorners are popped, not fried, which makes them a healthier option compared to traditional potato chips or other fried snacks. It's nice to indulge in a tasty treat without the guilt.The 7-ounce bag is a good size for individual snacking or sharing with friends and family. It's also great to have on hand for movie nights or as a convenient option to pack in lunch boxes.One of the best things about Popcorners is their versatility. They are delicious on their own, but they can also be paired with dips, salsa, or even used as a crunchy topping for salads.I appreciate that Popcorners Sea Salt are gluten-free, which makes them suitable for those with gluten sensitivities or celiac disease.One thing to note is that, like any crunchy snack, portion control is essential to avoid overindulgence.In conclusion, Popcorners Sea Salt is a crunchy and flavorful snack that I highly recommend. Whether you're looking for a savory treat to enjoy on its own or a versatile option for pairing with dips and more, these Popcorners deliver on both taste and texture. With their perfectly salted flavor and satisfying crunch, they are a fantastic choice for anyone seeking a delicious and guilt-free snack. Grab a bag, and get ready to pop some delightful goodness into your snack time!", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2023", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Vicki", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "sooooo tasty!", "content": "i loved these sooo much they are very good and tasty!!", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "careful shopper", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Tasty!", "content": "Really like these and the cheddar flavor also. Light and crunchy. Hard to stop eating", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "DB", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Best chips around", "content": "Pleasantly surprised when I discovered this brand of chips.  Fresh flavor - crispy sturdy chip if you like dipping.  A bit healthier than other types.  Dry, no oil used I suspect.  I feel I'm eating healthier with these than other brands.  Enjoyable selection of tasty flavor that are really good.  Nice variety.", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Kindle Customer", "rating": "4.0 ", "title": "Kettle flavor--Pretty good! ETA: White Cheddar=awesome", "content": "I had never tried these before I bought them from Amazon.  -A bit risky, yes, I know.  But with the majority of reviews being GREAT, I figured why not?  I'm glad that I took a chance...they're pretty darn good!  I really wanted to add to my \"low fat dry snack\" collection, to give a little more variety to the usual Pop Chips or Pirates Booty.  I'm happy to say that these Popcorners will be added to that collection.As for the taste, I was worried this would taste like Pop Chips Katy's Kettle, but they do not.  The texture is softer and crisp; not hard/gritty, like Pop Chips' Kettle version can be.  The kettle corn flavor is authentic, and isn't just a flavor coating...the entire chip is flavorful.  Although, I do think that they could cut back on the salt just a little.  There's a salty aftertaste that gets stronger as you eat more.  They're still delicious and I would definitely buy again, but it would be nice to not have as much of a salty aftertaste.Overall, if you're looking for a sweet yet salty low fat snack, give these a try!ETA: Amazon only allows one review, even though I've ordered the different flavors separately, so I'm adding in my opinion on the White Cheddar flavor:Ever tried Smartfood White Cheddar Popcorn?  That's almost exactly what Popcorners White Cheddar tastes like, minus those annoying hard pieces in the Smartfood's popcorn.  -Anyone who's eaten Smartfood's popcorn knows what I'm talking about with those random hard-as-a-rock pieces that you always encounter.  So basically, if you like the taste of Smartfood's popcorn, you will LOVE Popcorner's version!  It's simply delicious, with the perfect balance of saltiness and cheddar.  I've tried this flavor, the Kettle (as mentioned above), and the Sea Salt flavor.  The Sea Salt & Cheddar are definitely my favorites thus far, but I'm planning on trying the other ones, too.  I've finally seen most flavors in my grocery store, for relatively cheap ($1.50-$2)  I'm going to try the Jalapeno next, and add to this review after. :)", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2014", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "GrandmaCarol", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "If You Haven\u2019t Tried You Need To", "content": "The first time I tried these I immediately liked them. I\u2019ve tried in Kettle Corn, Cheddar and Spicy Queso. The flavor on the ones I tried are very good.  The Spicy Queso is Very spicy. Good Crunch and right size container.", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Wayne B. Carlson", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "....
