title: Pure Protein Bars, High Protein, Nutritious Snacks to Support Energy, Low Sugar, Gluten Free, Chocolate Peanut Caramel, 1.76oz, 12 Pack (Packaging May Vary)
description: About this item    NEW LOOK! One 12 count box of Pure Protein Chocolate Peanut Caramel Protein Bars    These protein snack bars offer delicious chocolate, peanut, and caramel flavors in every bar    Enjoy a gluten free protein bar pre workout, post workout, or on the go    Low sugar (1) protein bars each contain 20 grams of protein, 2 grams of sugar, and 190 calories    These 20g protein bars provide high-quality protein, an essential part of a nutritious, balanced diet
reviews: {"author": "Rachel C.", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Satisfy Your Cravings Healthily", "content": "As a health-conscious individual always on the lookout for convenient and nutritious options, I was excited to try these bars, and they did not disappoint. Pure Protein has truly nailed it with the flavor of these bars. The lemon cake flavor is refreshingly tangy and perfectly balanced, with just the right amount of sweetness to satisfy your cravings without feeling heavy or overly indulgent. It\u2019s like enjoying a slice of lemon cake without the guilt.But what really sets these bars apart is their nutritional profile. Each bar is packed with 20 grams of protein, making it an excellent choice for fueling your body and keeping you feeling satisfied throughout the day. Protein is essential for muscle repair and growth, making these bars ideal for post-workout recovery or simply as a mid-day pick-me-up.What\u2019s more, Pure Protein Lemon Cake Bars are low in sugar and carbs, making them a smart choice for anyone watching their intake of these nutrients. With only a fraction of the sugar found in traditional snack bars, you can enjoy these guilt-free knowing you\u2019re making a healthy choice for your body.I also appreciate the convenience factor of these bars. Whether you\u2019re rushing between meetings, hitting the gym, or simply need a quick snack on the go, Pure Protein Lemon Cake Bars are the perfect solution. They\u2019re individually wrapped, making them easy to toss in your bag or desk drawer for whenever hunger strikes.", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on February 25, 2024", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "chris pecile", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Good taste,good value", "content": "Along the lines of protein bars, these are very good. Granted, compared to a candy bar, maybe not, but these are protein bars. The ingredients are very good, high protein, low sugar. They are probably the cheapest yet highest quality protein bars on the market. Like I said, they are very good too, just don't expect a candy bar. Will continue to buy.", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2024", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Moises", "rating": "4.0 ", "title": "Slightly better than average", "content": "This is a typical protein bar. 200 calories with the standard dense and chewy protein with a gritty texture on your teeth and a slightly bitter aftertaste. That type of protein bar has been pretty much boilerplate for years now. The only difference is the combination of nuts or gross chocolate it is covered in.While the protein component of this bar is old hat, the fact it is covered in cake frosting flavored coating makes it taste better than most. So I do prefer this over most bars that try rather unconvincingly to be like a candy bar. I think the addition of a sparse splatter of sprinkles is pointless though. I guess they want to really sell the birthday cake angle, but there are not enough sprinkles to matter and sprinkles are made with dyes that are extremely questionable healthwise so it would be better without them. But aside from flavor, the other selling point is it has a very reasonable fat to protein ratio. This fits my nutritional needs better than most. Seems like all protein products these days try to hide the fat content of their products. Since fat is not an issue or even preferred for keto, I find that most protein bars lately have been jacking up the fat content to improve flavor and texture then just slapping a keto-friendly stamp on the packaging and then only advertise the high grams of protein and low grams of sugar and then avoid mentioning fat anywhere on the box except the nutritional facts chart. Most products advertised as keto-friendly have way more fat than my diet can handle. The fat to protein ratio in this product is 5/20 which is pretty good in comparison to similar products available.I  also ordered the chocolate mint cookie and lemon cake flavors as a subscription which is have not tried yet but expect to be good based on the way the birthday cake tasted. I would have preferred to subscribe to the birthday cake flavor but some flavors were not available for subscription and save, birthday cake being one of them. Another bummer is there is a big price difference depending on flavor. Birthday cake and some of the chocolate flavors were $4 more than the average price and the cookies and cream were $27 per box so nearly double the cost, and also not available by subscription.  I guess it is all coming from different suppliers or whatever so it is what it is. If it were to become available for subscription I'd likely get it. They aren't revolutionary but they are certainly more pleasant to eat than the average. But protein bars have been around for a while and they pretty much have hit a plateau on flavor and texture, so that in mind, these are the best I've had in a while.", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "paul v.", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "High protein", "content": "I feel that all these protein bars are a little overpriced and are taking advantage of people who love these things, but I was surprised by the amount of protein in these at 20g and the lower price than other bars of similar comparison. But the flavor and consistency and ingredients were good and make this well worth the money. I eat a bar before I workout and they seem to help me get through even the toughest days. Will definitely be buying more when I run out.", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on February 27, 2024", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Amazon Customer", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Best value and taste bar", "content": "These are a daily for me. 200 Cals and 20g protein for $1.50 is hard to beat. They work well as an alternative to only having protein shakes. The flavor and texture is as good as most other options. Too 3 choice - lemon, cookies & cream, birthday cake", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on March 10, 2024", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Donna M", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Taste great", "content": "Love the pure protein brand and have been drinking the shakes in the morning which keep me satisfied.  These protein bars are also an easy grab if you are running errands on in need of a pick me up.  They taste like a brownie and keep me full for hours.  I will continue to purchase these on Amazon as they are impossible to find elsewhere.", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on February 25, 2024", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "RC360 on YT", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Great grab and go snack to satisfy the cravings", "content": "I have a major sugar addiction, so trying to lose weight has been a lifetime of yo-yoing.Now when I feel that sugar craving I found that these protein bars (especially the birthday cake flavor) will help with that.They have enough protein and calories to be a meal replacement in a pinch but are best, for me, as a in between meal or on the run snack.Only 3 grams of sugar, 5 grams of fat and 20 grams of protein, great for after the gym as well.", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on February 22, 2024", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Rachael Lanier", "rating": "4.0 ", "title": "Very good", "content": "I love how this has a very chocolately taste! My only complain is towards the end of the bar it starts to taste more like that protein powder taste.", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2024", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Valeria", "rating": "1.0 ", "title": null, "content": "El sabor es muy feo, se deshace todo cuando lo abres o muerdes, he probado otras y siempre se me hace un gusto comerlas. En este caso estoy pensando que hacer con ellas porque el sabor es muy malo.", "date": "Reviewed in Mexico on February 29, 2024", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Susan Gagnon", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": null, "content": "They taste good", "date": "Reviewed in Canada on September 25, 2023", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Amazon Customer", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": null, "content": "I did share the Birthday Cake Protein Bar with friends and they all really liked them.I would highly recommend them!", "date": "Reviewed in Canada on July 29, 2022", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Duncan", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": null, "content": "I eat one of these bars after a cardio session and prior to a few hours of yardwork. I thought the candy bars looked a tad bit smaller than the ones sold years ago but it could be just me =). I was happy it was the vanilla cookie.  I did not care for the chocolate cookie that came out years ago.  Overall, I liked the candy and the price I paid for 18 packets was pretty cheap. title: PopCorners Snacks Gluten Free Chips, 4 Flavor Variety Pack 28 Count 1 oz Bags Packaged By Doomi, Individual Snack Bags in Sea Salt White Cheddar Sweet & Salty and Spicy Queso Flavors - Low-Calorie Popcorn Chips for Snacking Care Packages Parties & More

Healthier Snacks: PopCorners are made using a patented air-popping technique that combines heat and moisture under compression to pop light and crispy snacks. Air popped to perfection and never fried, PopCorners contain no artificial flavors.    Individual Packets: Each popped corn snack comes in its own individual, 1-ounce bag, offering the ideal portion size for snacking. Whether you’re curled up for a movie night, packing lunch or running errands, it’s the perfect snack.    Versatile Use: Doomi PopCorners Variety Pack offers an assortment of flavored chips for family members and friends to munch on at any time. As such, they’re perfect for schools, sports clubs, fundraisers, home parties, picnics, movie nights and more.    Travel Size: Easily take some PopCorners bags from this Bools Variety Pack when you’re traveling or on the go. These single-serving bags are great for school snacks, lunches, long car rides, camping trips, air travel and vacations.

I gave them away.", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2023", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Jennifer Quinn", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Great product but shipping packaging horrible.", "content": "Love the flavor of this product. Was so upset when Mondolez stopped making Cheese Nips as I do not like Cheez Itz. So I was happy when I found these as the taste is great however they ship it in an envelope and half the product is crushed when it arrives.", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2022", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "M", "rating": "1.0 ", "title": "They taste bad", "content": "The texture was not that great, but, more importantly, these tasted bad - they had a weird bitter taste that gets more unpleasant the more I try to eat them. Some people might attribute this to \"healthy ingredients\", but I can't tell that the ingredients are any healthier than regular cheezits.Mine were not expired, nor was there soap in my package like some of the other reviews said. The only thing I can think of is that the sunflower oil may have oxidized - this is when the polyunsaturated fats go rancid, like if you've ever had whole wheat flour that's been at room temperature for too many months, which leaves a bitter off taste like this.Cheezits use a mix of palm oil (will not oxidize quickly) and soybean oil (does oxizidize quickly), while these used \"expeller pressed sunflower oil\" (extremely prone to oxidation in this 'virgin' form, needs to be fresh but is somewhat healthier than palm or soybean if it is fresh). Regular cheezits also contain a scary sounding 'industrial' chemical called TBHQ which delays oxidation, while these don't appear to, meaning they will go rancid faster than cheezits.This could explain why some people are happy with theirs - they got theirs while the sunflower oil was still fresh, while other people got it before the sell by date but after the oil oxidized. That is a theory anyway. Regardless I will be throwing these out and not getting them again. I would rather eat TBHQ in safe quantities than something nasty tasting and rancid.", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2021", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Sam", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Good", "content": "My mom loves these. She said there better than other crackers", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2023", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}

title: Entenmann’s Rich Frosted Donuts, 8 Count
description: About this item    One package of eight Entenmann’s Rich Frosted Donuts    Moist golden cake donuts enrobed in a decadent layer of rich chocolatey frosting    Rich frosted donuts are the perfect companion for your morning coffee or afternoon tea and great as a midday snack to satisfy your sweet tooth    Entenmann’s Rich Frosted donuts are kosher dairy so everyone can enjoy the fun and delicious taste    An ideal breakroom snack, lunch box delight or party treat, these rich frosted doughnuts are a favorite that anyone can enjoy
ingredients: Sugar, Enriched Flour [Wheat Flour, Malted Barley Flour, Reduced Iron, Niacin, Thiamin Mononitrate , Riboflavin , Folic Acid], Palm Oil, Water, Hydrogenated Palm Kernel Oil, Cocoa , Soybean Oil, Nonfat Milk, Soy Flour, Egg Yolks, Leavening , Natural & Artificial Flavors, High Fructose Corn Syrup, Salt, Dextrose, Corn Syrup Solids, Soy Lecithin, Food Starch-Modified, Whey , Mono- And Diglycerides, Polysorbate 60, Potassium Sorbate , Xanthan Gum, Guar Gum, Corn Starch, Cellulose Gum, Karaya Gum, Beta Carotene .
reviews: {"author": "MrChiSox", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Just excellent!", "content": "I don't know for sure what it is about inexpensive boxed donuts that bring me such delight.  Certainly there are better donuts to be had.  Maybe it's nostalgia; my father would sometimes wake up early on a Saturday morning and take a walk up to the grocery store to buy a morning newspaper, cigarettes and a box of donuts for us kids to enjoy when we woke up.  Not these particular donuts, however.  These weren't carried by the grocery store, they featured Hostess and Dolly Madison back then.When my son was young he latched onto a box of these while my wife and I were shopping.  I couldn't say NO to him, they were on a table at the back corner of the store and priced at $1.  It would be my first experience with \"The Chocolate Wax Donut\".  And though I don't often eat these anymore my son sure loves them.So what's so good about them?  Well, in my book it's pretty simple.  First off you have to put them in the refrigerator so that they don't melt because then they are slimy.  Keep them good and waxy!  Next, pour yourself a tall glass of milk.  But leave some room in the glass.  Break the donut in half and dip it into the milk.  Hold it there for 2-3 seconds to get it good and saturated, then remove from the glass and hold it with the soaked end facing up so that the milk continues to filter into the cake inside.  Now enjoy!  It just tastes so good.  Enjoy!", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2021", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Robert Goldman", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "The diet killer.  Worth it.", "content": "Love these.Dangerously good", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on March 10, 2024", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Minnie Oh", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "love these", "content": "This brand always makes quality", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "NYCVillager", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Chocolate fix!", "content": "These donuts don't skimp on the chocolate.  A dependable go-to when needing, craving chocolate!  They could be a bit less pricey, I think.  It's sometimes a choice of these or something Pepperidge Farm.", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2023", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Customer", "rating": "4.0 ", "title": "Donuts are ok, but the real value is the convienience", "content": "These donuts are \"ok\". They are a bit dry and the chocolate tends to melt on hands, even at cooler early-fall temperatures. But the real value is the convienience. They taste the same the day they are delivered as they do a week later.  Their \"best by\" date usually gives plenty of time to buy them now and enjoy them a week+ later.  These are great to have for in case everyone is running late in the morning.  These are good treats both on a lazy weekend to have a quick something before brunch or can be a quick solution to a school day morning running behind schedule.  If you're looking for bakery fresh donuts - this isn't it. But if you're looking for something easy, not bad tasting and quick, then its a good option.", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "John P. Salvaggio", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Yummy", "content": "Yummy chocolate donuts", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "T.C.", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "I prefere these regular-size doughnuts over their \"Minis\".", "content": "Although they're obviously made of the same ingredients/batter, the Minis, being smaller and thus more strongly curved, are more dense and hard than their larger doughnuts. The standard, larger ones, not being so tightly curved, have more crevices (air pockets) and so are softer, lighter and fluffier than the little ones. This warning is so you cant sue them if you get sick cuz they warned you", "content": "WARNING: This product can expose you to cadmium, which is known to the States of California to cause cancer and birth defects or other reproductive harm.Cadmium is a metal that is found in nature and used in many industries and products.  For example, rechargeable nickel-cadmium batteries contain cadmium and are used to power many products, such as cameras, cell phones, and electric cars.Cadmium (Cd) is a toxic heavy transition metal released as a result of industrial and agricultural activities into soil and water where it can be absorbed by and accumulated in plants and aquatic organisms destined for the food supplyOnly a small amount of cadmium remains in the body after eating food contaminated with cadmium, but if consumed over a long period of time, cadmium can lead to kidney disease and cause bones to become weaker. I was having withdrawal from not having any (I usually eat the full size/full potency bag) and these were the only ones available for delivery today at a reasonable price.  2.  It is hard for me to eat just one serving of these and I thought that these would help pace myself.  They did.These are a smaller version of the full sized rolls you get on a regular purchase.  I noticed that they are not as hard on the teeth, with a softer crunch.  (not like a stale product - just easier to crunch which could be helpful to someone with sensitive teeth)These are only about 50-60 percent as potent as the regular ones.  I attribute this to the observation that there is not nearly as much coating of the seasoning on these as you get on the full size chip.  However, after eating these for a couple weeks, the lack of potency did not bother me as much but I still missed the full potency.I would recommend these for Takis beginners (those who are afraid to try the full-sized chip and potency) and for those who need to have individually-sized bags which also helps preserve freshness in the rest of the bag.", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Stevie  Thomas", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Dorm Life", "content": "My son enjoyed the Air Force was in basic, and his favorite thing is talkies. title: Honey Butter Chips (Original, 3)
description: About this item    Potato Corn Snacks in Korea und Japan    It is the honey butter chip that is the origin of sweet potato chips that caused the Korean honey butter craze. You can feel the original taste by using 100% raw potato. In particular, with a sweet and savory blend of 12-hour fermented French gourmet butter and acacia honey, it boasts an unstoppable attractive taste. Immerse yourself in the charm of honey butter chips, which are comparable to snacks and snacks for our children.
reviews: {"author": "Abi", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "I loved it", "content": "These chips were amazing, they had a really nice sweet but savory taste. I honestly had to have more after having a couple chips because they were just that good.", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on February 28, 2024", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Maria N", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Amazing taste!", "content": "These chips are addictive \ud83d\ude0b  taste great!", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2024", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Angelique Valentini", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Mystic Messenger", "content": "I have been playing Mystic Messenger since 2017, and has been the one app I have never deleted. The characters are great, including my top three favorites known as Saeyoung, Saeran, and Yoosung.But...what does that have to do with this product?I'll tell you.Saeyoung Choi, AKA 707, has a favorite snack that consists of Honey Butter Chips and Ph. D Pepper. Even better these look like the exact same brand, only the ones I recieved had the writing in English as pictured. I didn't think these were real until I decided to look them up on Amazon last week. As soon as I saw them and they have mainly good reviews, I decided to buy them.PACKAGING:As you can see no chip bag was ripped, hence I found no chips scattered in the box. They had those plastic puffy bags on the top, just enough to keep them in place. The chips are also up to date, and won't expire until six months from now.PRICE:You can choose how many bags, so of course the price varies. These are three bags of them, bigger than the snack size but smaller than a regular bag of chips you would get at a grocery store. I bought the three PC one, which I got for $10 and somethings cents.For someone like me who lives in the U.S. and can't get these chips anywhere else, $10 for three bags of a Korean product is not considered expensive. Each of the three bags would be about $3 a PC on their own, so it's fair.FLAVOR:I'll do my best, I'm not Daym Drops.It's as it says all over the bags, HONEY BUTTER. The chips remind me of Lay's but not as thin and won't break at even the lightest touch like Lay's. When you bite into it, there is that beautiful, crispy crunchy sound as you would get with any other chip similar to it.It's not a salty chip, but sweet instead and not overly so. The chips is a sweet buttery flavor with a hint of honey to it. Nothing is too strong in flavor, everything is just right; you know, you can taste the potato chip.Everything balanced.Doctor Who introduced me to Jelly Babies, I enjoyed those.Mystic Messenger introduced me to Honey Butter chips, I enjoyed those as well.Thanks Saeyoung!", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2021", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Strawberry", "rating": "4.0 ", "title": "they taste very strongly of butter", "content": "I, like most people who bought this, bought it because of mysmes and it it nothing like i thought it would be. the bags were bigger than i thought theyd be. smaller than the big chips bags as the store but  bigger then  the smaller ones.now onto the flavour, they taste so much like butter and are very sweet. i dont like how they taste but ive found that the more  you eat the better they taste and they pair very nice with soda", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2021", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Kelly", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Delicious and addictive", "content": "I tried another version of this while visiting Japan. I was excited to see them available on Amazon. These are scrumptious and before you know it the bag is gone! Good thing it\u2019s a pack of three!!", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Lovelyjya", "rating": "3.0 ", "title": "Ehhhhhhh not for me \ud83d\ude12", "content": "I didn\u2019t care for these chips.  You do get a butter flavor but it tastes a little synthetic.  The honey flavor isn\u2019t bad either.  It\u2019s not a bad combination but I just didn\u2019t like it.  I love buttery honey fried chicken wings though lol", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2022", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "ijaja", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Love these!", "content": "I just wish they still sold them at the local farmers market, but I haven't seen them in months & they weren't as expensive as they are on here.", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2024", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Andrea Robledo", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "interesting experience", "content": "this was probably a very interesting experience. i\u2019ve been getting into mystic messenger lately and of course, i couldn\u2019t help myself when buying these. i\u2019ve read the negative reviews first before it came and i instantly got nervous. i didn\u2019t want opened bags showing up. it was terrible. anyways i finally open the box and see a large plastic bag with the 3 chips sitting up perfect. not a single bag that was open. immediately i was relieved. i took a bag out of the bag and tried to open it.. THE SEAL WAS TOO POWERFUL. maybe because of the people reporting opened bags? i\u2019m not sure but these were way too powerful to open. finally after about a minute or two, i opened it. and immediately came the scent of sweet butter. it smelled nice, but that\u2019s just me. i ate one single chip and i was...shocked. i can understand why people say that it tastes like plastic. it has a wack aftertaste but when eating the chip, it was like sweet flavored butter. i mean, i\u2019m not sure exactly about honey but i definitely taste the butter. my brother didn\u2019t like it because of the aftertaste but i could probably eat these like popcorn. i mean, i\u2019m not gonna be like seven or yoosung and just eat bag after bag, but these were really good on the first go. i am however concerned with the chemical warning lmao. that is very concerning. but other than that, these taste pretty good. even though it would take a powerful god (like seven lol) to open the chips, these are pretty good.", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2021", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "alfredo aranda ", "rating": "1.0 ", "title": null, "content": "El pedido dice 3 bolsas y nom\u00e1s lleg\u00f3 una y dice que no se puede devolver el producto grande estafa", "date": "Reviewed in Mexico on November 5, 2023", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Robin ", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": null, "content": "the chips expired june 3 2021, and I ordered them in October! disappointed because they\u2019re so good and expensive", "date": "Reviewed in Canada on October 16, 2021", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Mrs. Pjm Knighton", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": null, "content": "I loved these, they are completely different to any other crisp I've tried. reviews: {"author": "Amazon Customer", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Great product!", "content": "They are baked and do not taste like a regular protein bar. They have 16 grams of protein per bar. I would definitely order them again.", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2024", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Sherry Plante", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "love this product", "content": "tastes like a candy bar but good for you and high in protein. Good substitution for a meal if on the run.", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Ryan", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Taste/texture so worth it", "content": "I tried these because I was so sick of my current protein bar tasting like artificially flavored muck that I had to chew for five minutes every bite while drinking huge amounts of water simply to help it dissolve. If you look at the nutrition info, sure, the protein might be a little lower compared to other brands, but the better taste and texture of these actually makes it worth it to me. Of the protein bars I\u2019ve tried, these are easily my favorite, and I\u2019ve already ordered another variety pack to try even more flavors. Milk and cookies was my favorite, but all of the flavors I tried were at least decent for me, and hands down better than the nasty tasting protein bars I already mentioned.If you are looking at this product because you are tired of your current protein snack, odds are this will at the very least mix things up well for you. description: About this item    Strawberry flavor    Hi-Chew Strawberry sticks make a perfect "pick-me-up" Snack for on the go or at home    Hi-Chew is an explosion of real, fruity flavors with a long lasting chewy texture    Contains real fruit juices and purees, no artificial colors, gluten free, cholesterol-free, and 0g Trans fat    Hi-Chew has long been the #1 soft candy in Japan, and in recent years, has become a hit in the rest of Asia and America
ingredients: Glucose Syrup, Sugar, Vegetable Oil , Less than 2% of Gelatin, Natural and Artificial Flavors, Malic Acid, Citric Acid, Strawberry Juice Concentrate, Sucrose Fatty Acid Esters, Sorbitan Monostearate, Purple Carrot Juice , Soy Lecithin.
reviews: {"author": "John", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Hi-Chew Candy Sticks: Spooky Fun for Your Taste Buds!", "content": "Let me start by saying that I bought this Hi-Chew Candy Sticks Variety Pack for Halloween, and it turned out to be one heck of a flavorful haunted house for my taste buds. This assortment is like a candy cornucopia with a twist, and I'm here to break it down for you.First of all, the packaging gets extra points for its Halloween vibes. The box looks like it could have come straight from a witch's candy stash - vibrant colors and eerie illustrations that scream, \"Boo! I'm delicious!\" It's so tempting that it's almost scary.Now, on to the candy sticks themselves. The variety in this pack is amazing. There are eight different flavors, and it's like a spooky roulette every time you reach for one. I mean, who wouldn't be intrigued by the idea of mystery-flavored taffy? It's like playing Russian Roulette, but with much tastier consequences.The texture of these Hi-Chew sticks is where the magic happens. They're soft and chewy, with a satisfying taffy-like consistency that leaves you pulling stretchy candy ghosts from your mouth. It's like a workout for your jaw, but the payoff is sweet (literally).The flavors are truly a mixed bag of Halloween tricks and treats. You've got classics like strawberry and green apple, which are like the familiar faces at a costume party. Then there are surprises like lychee and mango, which are like the guests who show up wearing the most unexpected costumes \u2013 exotic and exciting.The taste is where the real fun begins. Some flavors are so spot-on that you'd think Hi-Chew had a witch's brew in their candy-making laboratory. Others might be a bit more acquired, but hey, that's what Halloween is all about - trying new things and getting a little spooked in the process.As for the sweetness, it's just right. Not too overpowering, so you can indulge without feeling like you're in a candy coma. You can snack on these bad boys while watching your favorite horror movies, and they'll never steal the show. They're the perfect co-stars.Now, some may say that Hi-Chew Candy Sticks are a bit pricey for Halloween candy, but remember, you're not just buying candy \u2013 you're investing in a spooktacular experience that's sure to thrill both your taste buds and your party guests.In conclusion, the Hi-Chew Candy Sticks Variety Pack is the ultimate Halloween candy for those who like a little adventure with their sweet treats. It's the trick-or-treating experience you've been missing in your life. Whether you're handing them out to trick-or-treaters or enjoying them all by yourself, these Hi-Chew sticks are a winner. Just be prepared for some ghoulishly good times and maybe even a few taste bud scares along the way!", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "R. Geist", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "I live in the US and I am not normally a candy guy -- that said -  this Japanese candy is awesome description below", "content": "So,  I live in the US and  this candy is fairly hard to find here unless you know about it or encounter it in the candy section of your world market.But I happened on it at a family run homestyle Japanese restaurant and it is really unusual but amazingly yummy.  AND USEFUL for someone looking for a fun way to produce natural saliva from a good but tangy flavor.First know,  I am not normally a candy guy, but I found the taste and texture of this so unusual and yummy I wanted others outside of Japan or other countries where it is widely sold and marketed to know about it.  It comes packaged like a pack of chewing gum in blocks.  But it is not gum.  though its texture is like that of gum initially,  really flavorful classic Grape Kool aid flavor gum.  It is also chewey like gum though it does over time get softer and softer and it is meant to be swallowed.  But what really makes its so neat is that one the flavor is reminiscent of that childhood perfect candy grape flavor and where it is sweet and tangy and makes your mouth water.  Also it chews just like gum except the flavor does not get less and less like gum.  it stays pungent with a nice mix of sweet and tangy Grape flavor until it gets so soft you just swallow it or you can let it slowly dissolve in your mouth.  I have had to be on some medications that can cause my mouth to get really dry and very few things can move my latent salivary glands to produce more saliva.  And while this product does have sugar in it.  it is still the best way I have found to produce my own moisture.  Also one or two pieces can really be satisfying and you have a nice flavor in your mouth and you do not need to keep eating the candy.  I have never seen another item like this where the texture starts out like a bubble gum block and then you chew on it to get this explosion of Grape Kool aide flavor that never lessens until you swallow it.  its like the gum you always wanted but never got in that the flavor stays and you can swallow it when you are done chewing.  Grape is by far and away my favorite flavor though I have tried strawberry and Pear  with friends and  some like the strawberry better.  None of the flavors taste bad.  in fact that is the other cool thing is that the whole theme of their flavor variety is a sweet and tangy take on natural fruit flavors.  I have given a piece to many unsuspecting people at this point and almost every time,  they either immediately say \"WOW! what is this stuff?\"  or they come back and make a point to ask me about it later. I even gave it to a guy in my neighborhood grocery store and he ran up to me the next time I came in the store and took down all the information on what the candy was and how and where he can get it.  Other than Amazon where they charge a fair price for a full case of the stuff -- usually around 11 dollars.  You might find the candy in single form for about a dollar and some change a package -- the case comes with ten packs and I cannot stress how fun and good this is.  If anyone who is reading this is looking for a great way to occasionally pop a treat in their mouth that will produce a ton of their own moisture, its great for that too,  You just chew it a bit then let it sort of sit there like candy gum and it will just gush out its flavor. If I had to bet which would be the most popular flavor I would say it would be grape.  But then I always had a weakness for certain childhood flavors of good kool-aid.  if you wanted to put a sweet tangy grape taste in your mouth that you could chew on like gum for a while and then either just suck on it and let it shed its flavor just like it was new or to chew it till it was so hot, chewed and soft that you could swallow it.  This is your candy.  I could have used  the taffy texture for this but it really is not sticky until the very end when one might be prone to swallow it.  -- of course coming through Amazon,  it came quickly well packaged and ready to go. totally fun thing to have around the house to put in a travel bag for something sweet to have as a change from sugar free gum which i also carry.  and a fun treat that will totally mesmerize western kids of all ages.  if you look at the individual piece it even has neat detailing as the outside is a milky white but in the center there is purple center for grape, red for strawberry and so forth.  Very reminiscent of Jelly Bellies.  if someone eats healthy most of the time but are looking for fun treats that can satisfy for a while with just a piece or two and are unique -- I would definitely try this candy out.  It is very Japanese with its focus on details. and that the texture of the candy is as cool as the taste.  and the grape taste is clean is that makes any sense.  no super gross chemical aftertaste.  If you know your taste is different then perhaps you can try something other than Grape but for me Grape is the best and it seems to have the most universal appeal. I wanted to check out and see if they had a mango or orange flavor too.  I would love to give these out on halloween if they had a smaller pack to give out.  In my opinion its a cannot miss.  maybe you will love it maybe you will just like it,  but I would be shocked if you did not at least really like it.  And all this from a guy who is not into candy and usually only has sugar free spearmint gum.", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2013", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "SIR R D M", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Best Bananna Chewy Around!", "content": "Great flavor & texture!!!!", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2024", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Amazon Customer", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "I love these", "content": "I love these and we can't get them at stores where I live. Found these and were better priced than I remember in store. title: Quest Nutrition Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Protein Bars, High Protein, Low Carb, Gluten Free, Keto Friendly, 12 Count
description:
About this item    YOU DESERVE A SPECIAL TREAT: The Quest Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Protein Bar tastes like a scoop of cookie dough fresh from the bowl. Only our version is packed with chocolate flavored chips and has 21g protein 4g net carbs and 1g sugar    UNWRAP COMPLETE PROTEINS: Quest Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Protein Bars are made with complete, dairy-based proteins to provide your body with 9 essential amino acids.    FIBER IS YOUR FRIEND: Each Quest Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Protein Bar has 12g of fiber to provide your body with a more complete macro profile.    SWEET WITHOUT ADDED SUGAR: Enjoy the rewarding taste of Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough without worrying about added sugars. The Quest Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Protein Bar has no added sugars.    COMFORT FOODS FOR ANYTIME CRAVINGS: The Quest Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Protein bar is a sweet treat, without all the sugar, you can enjoy whenever you want to satisfy your sweet tooth.    Box contains 12 Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough flavored Quest Protein Bars    20 Gram of protein per bar    
   All natural and Gluten free Delicious and convenient Packed with fiber to make you feel full Helps with digestion and weight loss   Show more
reviews: {"author": "lV", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Protein, Fiber and Taste", "content": "The Quest Cookies and Cream protein bar is packed with 21g of protein, 13 g of fiber, only 1 g of sugar, 190 calories and a pleasant taste. The bar is a little harder than cookie dough but is still soft and chewy. It is not as sweet as cookie dough but still tastes somewhat sweet and more like a treat than a high protein, high fiber product.Quest accomplishes the good taste without all the sugar by using the sugar alcohol Erythritol.Erythritol has been shown to be safe as it is excreted from the body in an unchanged form and is less likely to upset the digestive tract as it goes through the bloodstream and is excreted in urine rather than being passed through the digestive tract where other sugar alcohols can be fermented, resulting in digestive issues. Additionally, Erythritol does not result in increases in blood sugar and insulin (important for diabetics or those trying to lose weight or with insulin resistance).The ingredients indicate that these bars contain almonds. I can't digest nuts or legumes, however I don't taste the nuts and have not had any issues with digesting these bars, which has made me happy, because almonds have a number of nutritional benefits, but I'm guessing the amount present is probably pretty small, although they rank relatively high on the ingredient list.In terms of the proteins and fiber, Quest uses a blend of milk protein isolate and whey protein isolate, which has been shown to have a good yield and blend of amino acids. The fiber is in the form of polydextrose, a common prebiotic fiber.Overall, Quest has found a formula to make a tasty nutrition bar that is both high in protein and high in fiber (a benefit that most protein bars don't include), while being very low in sugar. Nutritionally these bars seem to offer a lot of benefits as well as being a tasty treat.", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Rene Grigorian", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Great snack! Love it", "content": "I have been eating Quest bars for a long time and these are my absolute favorite flavor. I love the taste of these and the fact that this keeps me full in between meals is a great plus. For someone who just started on his Keto journey, these have been a great snacking option when I eat my lunch and also after dinner before I fast from 7 pm - 12 pm the next day.Highly recommend these to anyone. Great product", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on March 8, 2024", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Sarah B.", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Favorite Protein Bars", "content": "Quest protein bars are by far the best. No chalky taste like other protein bars, low sugar to fit into any macro diet, and taste delicious! They're are so easy for on the go for breakfast or a post work out treat.This is a great alternative to satisfying hunger. Buying in bulk is much more reasonable vs.the price per bar you find in the local grocery stores.", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on March 8, 2024", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Alana ", "rating": "4.0 ", "title": "Pretty decent", "content": "These have a pretty good amount of protein and fewer carbs than many other bars which I like. The cookie dough flavor is not horrible but certainly not my favorite i\u2019ve had. It\u2019s quite hard/chewy and has strong artificial sweetener taste. That being said, I will definitely finish the box but probably stick to the crispy Quest bars going forward!", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on March 12, 2024", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Tom", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Like a healthy cookie", "content": "Quest Nutrition Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Protein Bars are a delicious and convenient snack option for anyone looking to fuel their active lifestyle. Packed with 21 grams of protein and only 1 gram of sugar, these bars provide a satisfying and guilt-free treat. The chocolate chip cookie dough flavor is decadent and indulgent, making it feel like you're enjoying a dessert rather than a protein bar. title: Jack Link's Beef Jerky, Sweet & Hot, Spicy Meat Snack – 9g of Protein & 80 Calories, Made with Premium Beef, No added MSG** or Nitrates/Nitrites, 5.85 oz
description: About this item    MADE WITH 100% BEEF : Our Sweet & Hot Beef Jerky is made of lean cuts of 100% premium beef. It's 96% fat free and has no added MSG and no added nitrates or nitrites.    GOOD SOURCE OF PROTEIN : Protein is an essential part of diets and Sweet & Hot Beef Jerky is a great way to get more. With 9g of protein and 80 calories per serving, it's a protein-packed meat snack that helps keep you satisfied when you need it most.    RESEALABLE SHARING SIZE :The jumbo 5.85 oz. sharing size bag is resealable and has about 6 servings in each bag. It's perfect for sharing with family and friends on a hunting trip or to stash in your secret spot and keep all to yourself.    FULL ON FLAVOR :It's the best of both worlds: heat and sweet. We marinate each strip of our Sweet & Hot Jerky with a blend of smoky sweet chili and black pepper. This combo builds while you're eating for heat perfectly balanced with a touch of sweet.    PERFECT EVERYDAY SNACK : How did ancient civilizations fuel themselves to cross oceans or win sword battles? Meat. If it worked for them, Jack Link's Beef Jerky can help you power thru a late day at work, tackle your honey-do list or fuel a workout.
ingredients: BEEF, SUGAR, WATER, LESS THAN 2% SALT, FLAVORINGS, YEAST EXTRACT, CITRIC ACID.

After I pulled this beast out of the pantry the music stopped... people stopped drinking their alcohol, dancing in the kitchen, talking on the couch, and eating the other worthless snacks. The party very quickly shifted to the center of my living room. The focus was unreal, all it took was one guy trying to toss a goldfish in the air and catch it in his mouth. We had a circle of about 10 people, all with a handful of the tastiest fish around, tossing the goldfish for others to catch. People that previously didn't get along were now laughing and trying to catch as many goldfish as they could. That's when I realized... Flavor blasted Goldfish aren't just a snack, in fact... they are way more than that. Flavor Blasted Xtra Cheddar Goldfish are a way to bring people together, to solve lifelong grudges and hardships. On the outside they just look like a happy very powdered fish shaped cracker, but they are on a different level than any other snack I have ever tried. They taste like they aren't just blasted with flavor, but blasted with love and happiness. For hours we experienced the greatness that is Xtra Cheddar Goldfish.  We didn't need alcohol or drugs, this was so much more than that. I will never forget that night and I will never have a party without a 30 Oz Carton of Xtra Cheddar Flavor Blasted Pepperidge Farm Goldfish Crackers.To put the great value of this product into perspective - If you attend a party with a carton of Xtra Cheddar Goldfish you will be more respected than the guy that brought the $80 bottle of alcohol, but don't look down on him... reviews: {"author": "\u00c6x Yair Cortex", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Starbursts never let me down", "content": "The Sharing Size Pack of Original Starbursts is a sweet treat that's sure to satisfy your taste buds. With its iconic, bright yellow packaging, you know you're in for a flavorful explosion of sweet goodness. These tiny, crunchy candies are filled with a soft, chewy center that melts in your mouth, making them perfect for any occasion. Whether you're sharing them with friends or enjoying them by yourself, these Original Starbursts are the perfect pick-me-up for any midday slump or late-night snack craving.One of the best things about the Sharing Size Pack of Original Starbursts is their variety of flavors. With favorites such as strawberry, cherry, orange, and lemon, there's sure to be a flavor that you love. Whether you have a sweet tooth or enjoy tart flavors, there's something for everyone. Plus, the Sharing Size Pack is the perfect size for sharing with friends, making it an excellent choice for parties or gatherings.The Sharing Size Pack of Original Starbursts is also versatile. reviews: {"author": "Chris Mendes", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Classic Favorite", "content": "Cheddar Goldfish Crackers have been a staple in our household for as long as I can remember. These iconic little fish-shaped crackers are not only a classic, but they also hold a special place in my son's heart. They have become his go-to snack, and for good reason!First and foremost, the cheddar flavor is absolutely delicious. It has just the right amount cheesy goodness that keeps you coming back more. The crackers have a satisfying crunch that adds an extra level of enjoyment to every bite. Whether it's a quick snack on the go or a part of lunchtime, these crackers always hit the spot.Not only are Cheddar Goldfish Crackers tasty, but they are also made with high-quality ingredients. As a parent, it gives me peace of mind knowing that my son is snacking on a product that is free from artificial preservatives and flavors. It's comforting to see him enjoy a snack that I can feel good about.The portability of these crackers is also worth mentioning. They come in convenient resealable bags, making it easy to take them on road trips, picnics, or simply pack them for school lunches. The individual fish shapes are fun and make snack time even more enjoyable for kids and adults alike.Furthermore, Cheddar Goldfish Crackers are not only a hit with my son but with the whole family. It's a snack that brings everyone together, whether it's sharing a handful during movie nights or munching on them during playdates. They have a universal appeal that makes them a crowd-pleaser for all ages.In conclusion, Cheddar Goldfish Crackers are a classic favorite in our household. With their delicious cheddar flavor, quality ingredients, and convenient packaging, they continue to be a snack that my son loves and we can all enjoy. If you haven't tried them yet, I highly recommend giving them a go - they are sure to become a staple in your pantry too!", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Shanique", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Great value", "content": "Love these, great value. Great snack.", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2024", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Matthew Palmer", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Seal of Approval (aka Seal Snack Shenanigans aka Sealed with a Snack aka Keepin it Seal)", "content": "My friend, Leigh, has an unusual hobby of portraying a lion seal periodically. She indulges in this activity during the autumn months, coinciding with the heightened seal activity in the northeastern region where she resides. Employing a makeshift seal costume fashioned from a sleeping bag, she frequents the beach to recline on rocks, emulating the behavior of these marine creatures. On occasion, she extends invitations for me to join her, assuming the role of a seal feeder. Remarkably, despite her aversion to fish, Leigh has found a solution in Goldfish crackers. She appreciates the rich cheddar flavor and the delightful crunch, which contrasts with the aquatic environment. To enhance the experience, she even procured a designated vessel for me to dispense the crackers. In the realm of seal cosplay, Goldfish has earned Leigh's unequivocal \"seal of approval\".", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2024", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "j", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "I love my fishes cause they\u2019re so delicious", "content": "Delicious, goldfish crackers. FRUITY, CHEWY LAFFS: Laffy Taffy is known for its authentic long lasting fruit flavors, smooth & chewy texture, and light-hearted jokes on every wrapper    GREAT FOR SHARING: Laffy Taffy products are individually packaged, making them a perfect treat to share with friends, family, and coworkers; They're great for after school, after dinner, and anytime snacking.    MANY WAYS TO ENJOY: Bring smiles out of hiding with our tasty wrapped laughs in a variety of flavors and forms, from Stretchy and Tangy to Mini Bars and Ropes.    LEGENDARY FAVORITES AND EXCITING NEW FLAVORS: Laffy Taffy stays focused producing sweet treats for people to share & enjoy every day, from the legendary favorites you love to exciting new flavors!

title: ZonePerfect Protein Bars | 14g Protein | 19 Vitamins & Minerals | Nutritious Snack Bar | Chocolate Peanut Butter | 20 Bars
reviews: {"author": "Kacy", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "They are not certified gluten free but I've never had a reaction", "content": "I am highly sensitive to gluten but have never reacted to these. At one point, all dark chocolate Zone Bars were advertised as gluten free. On checking, label now lists that facility processes wheat. I've relied on the Fudge Graham or Peanut Butter Zone Bars for at least 10-15 years (once a week?) and never had a problem. They have really good nutrient balance for preventing sugar spikes/crashes until I can get safe food. I keep one (or peanuts) in my purse to for when there are no other options, and they are delicious.", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2024", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Samantha Larsen ", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Best Tasting Protein Bar Ever Made and helped me reached my daily protein goals!!", "content": "Ok, so Im a mature woman and I have had sooo many different types and brands of protein bars from Cliff bars to Kind bars to RX bars etc etc and nothing compares to ZONE PERFECT bars hands down the best one. Firstly the texture is like a rice crispy candy treat and a granola bar mixed together light but super satisfying one will keep you full fro a bit. The flavors are so good they do not taste like fake sweetness not cardboard. I need help with protein levels as I dont eat meat and I also have about 3 businesses 4 rescue animals a stepdaughter and husband and I eat on the go basically 50% of my life.I first had the ZONE bar on set and I immediately was addicted. I had the cookie dough than I started buying them at Ralphs and was going through them quick so I ordered about 120 bars (all fudge graham) on amazon. I have dedicated whole draw to them in the kitchen.So back to my protein levels and minerals levels were low and I eat about 4 a day and had to get another blood test and my levels were all better the only thing I added was more ZONE bars.Also they aren't high in sugar and the Fudge Graham reminds me of s'mores and I LOVE s'mores.I also find them reasonably priced compared to other bar that taste like cardboard. I dont eat a lot in general Im real picky and I need a lot of bang for my buck so the bars are like my total got to for a protein bar.What's important to me especially at my age (middle age) is that they have no artificial anything!!Also they are never dry they are moist I can't get enough of the texture its so awesome.They are hands down the only bar I can eat now. I never get sick of it Ive been eating them since I first had them years ago on set:)", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2022", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Jennifer Mazur", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Zone PERFECT nutrition bar!", "content": "Without a doubt, I will buy these bars again and again as long as they're available! Best tasting nutrition bar I've ever had and I've tried everything! I pray they don't suddenly stop making them! I was SO disappointed when they stopped stocking them in the local stores. But these bars are SO worth the extra money I spend to buy them online. Thank you Zone Perfect for the perfect nutrition bar!", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Julie Frady", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "They\u2019re dangerously delicious", "content": "They taste great There good for any type of to go snack I really like them. title: Jack Link's Beef Tender Bites, Teriyaki, ½ Pounder Bag - Flavorful Jerky Snack for Lunches, 10g of Protein and 70 Calories, Made with Premium Beef - No Added MSG or Nitrates/Nitrites (Packaging May Vary)
description: About this item    GOOD SOURCE OF PROTEIN – On-the-go snacks should have plenty of protein and Jack Link's Teriyaki Beef Tender Bites are a quick way to get more. 10g of protein per serving.    MADE WITH 100% BEEF – Our tender beef nuggets are made with lean cuts of 100% Premium beef, marinated with our timeless Teriyaki spice blend. Then, we slow cook it over hardwood smoke for the delicious taste everyone loves    FULL ON FLAVOR – Jack Link's expertly crafted meat snack bites are slow cooked, resulting in a tender, easy to chew snack. Even the kiddos will love this snack in their lunchbox or on-the-go during busy days.    PERFECT EVERYDAY SNACK : How did ancient civilizations fuel themselves to build pyramids or win sword battles, Meat. Meat. If it worked for them, Jack Link's beef jerky can definitely help you power through a late day at work or a hunting expedition or fuel a workout    PORTABLE – There's no better quick snack than our poppable beef nuggets. It's the perfect snack to help power thru your mid-morning snack attack, getting over the 2PM slump or fueling your weekend to-do list.
ingredients: BEEF, SUGAR, WATER, CONTAINS 2% OR LESS OF SALT, SOY SAUCE , FRUCTOSE, FLAVORS, MONOSODIUM GLUTAMATE, HYDROLYZED CORN PROTEIN, MALTODEXTRIN, SODIUM ERYTHORBATE, PAPRIKA EXTRACT, SODIUM NITRITE. TREATED WITH A SOLUTION OF POTASSIUM SORBATE TO ENSURE FRESHNESS. CONTAINS: SOY, WHEAT

reviews: {"author": "Nathaniel Bornstein", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "Good Flavor, Good Value", "content": "The Quest Nutrition Crispy Cookies & Cream Hero Protein Bar is a popular choice among health-conscious individuals seeking a tasty yet nutritious snack option. While the Quest Nutrition Hero Protein Bar offers a convenient snack option, it does contain certain artificial sweeteners and flavors.Texture Variation: Depending on individual preferences, some users may find the texture of the Hero Protein Bar to be slightly different from traditional snack bars due to its high protein content and use of alternative ingredients.Overall, the Quest Nutrition Crispy Cookies & Cream Hero Protein Bar is a convenient and satisfying snack option for individuals looking to support their protein intake while managing sugar and carbohydrate consumption. When opening package was surprised and glad of the size of bag and know family will enjoy for a while so is a good deal for a sweet treat.", "date": "Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024", "verified": "Verified Purchase"}; {"author": "Oran Belgrave877888", "rating": "5.0 ", "title": "A short history of l Lifesavers.", "content": "                    The media could not be loaded.                \u00a0Hotep brothers and sisters and thank you for looking at my review of Life Savers an American brand of ring-shaped hard and soft candy. Its range of mints and fruit-flavored candies is known for its distinctive packaging, coming in paper-wrapped aluminum foil rolls.Candy manufacturer Clarence Crane of Garrettsville, Ohio (father of the poet Hart Crane) invented the brand in 1912 as a \"summer candy\" that could withstand heat better than chocolate. The candy's name is since its shape resembles that of a traditional ring-style life preserver also known as a \"life saver\".After registering the trademark, Crane sold the rights to his Pep-O-Mint peppermint candy to Edward John Noble for $2,900. Instead of using cardboard rolls, which were not very successful, Noble created tin-foil wrappers to keep the mints fresh. Noble founded the Life Savers and Candy Company in 1913 and significantly expanded the market for the product by installing Life Savers displays next to the cash registers of restaurants and grocery stores. He also encouraged the owners of the establishments to always give customers a nickel in their change to encourage sales of the 5\u00a2 Life Savers. The slogan \"Still only 5 cents\" helped Life Savers to become a favorite treat for children with a tight allowance. Since then, many different flavors of Life Savers have been produced. The five-flavor roll first appeared in 1935.A series of mergers and acquisitions by larger companies began in 1956. Life Savers is currently a property of Mars, Incorporated. In recent decades, the brand expanded to include Gummi Savers in 1992, Life Saver Minis in 1996, Creme Savers in 1998, and Life Saver Fusions in 2001. Discontinued varieties include Fruit Juicers, Holes, Life Saver Lollipops, and Squeezit.Life Savers was first created in 1912 by Clarence Crane, a Garrettsville, Ohio, candy maker (and father of the famed poet Hart Crane). Clarence had switched from the maple sugar business to chocolates the year before, but found that they sold poorly in the summer, because air conditioning was rare, and they melted. He saw a machine pharmacies used to make pills that were round and wafer-shaped, and thought he'd use those to make mints, which at the time were made square (because they were pressed in sheets and then sliced into squares). The machinery could also punch a hole in the center, and Crane named the candy after its resulting life preserver shape.In 1913, Crane sold the formula for his Life Savers candy to Edward Noble of Gouverneur, New York for $2,900. Noble started his own candy company and began producing and selling the mints known as Pep-O-Mint Life Savers. He also began to package the mints into rolls wrapped in tin foil to keep them from going stale. This process was done by hand until 1919 when machinery was developed by Edward Noble's brother, Robert Peckham Noble, to streamline the process.In 1921, the company began to produce solid fruit drops. In 1925, technology improved to allow a hole in the center of the fruit candies. These were introduced as the \"fruit drop with the hole\" and came in Orange, Lemon and Lime, each of which were packaged in their own separate rolls. In contrast to the opaque white mints previously produced by the company, these new candies were crystal-like in appearance. These new flavors quickly became popular with the public. Four new flavors were quickly introduced, namely, anise, butter rum, cola and root beer, which were made in the clear fruit drop style. Other than butter rum, which remains in the brand's lineup of flavors, these did not prove to be as popular as the three original fruit drop flavors. In 1931, the Life Savers \"Cough Drop\" was introduced with menthol, but it was not successful. In 1931, rolls of pineapple and cherry fruit drops were also introduced. As the public response proved positive for these, a new variety of mint called Cryst-O-Mint, made in this same crystal-like style, was introduced in 1932. In 1935, the classic \"Five Flavor\" rolls were introduced, offering a selection of five different flavors (pineapple, lime, orange, cherry, and lemon) in each roll. This flavor lineup was unchanged for nearly 70 years, until 2003, when three of the flavors were replaced in the United States, making the rolls pineapple, cherry, raspberry, watermelon, and blackberry. However, orange was subsequently reintroduced .\u2022 1912: Crane's Peppermint Life Savers created by Clarence Crane in Garrettsville, Ohio.\u2022 1913: Edward Noble bought the Life Saver formula, renamed Pep-O-Mint Life Savers, and started Mint Products Company in New York City.\u2022 1921: The first fruit flavors were produced as solid candies.\u2022 1925: Technology improved to allow a hole in the center of the fruit candies.\u2022 1927: Cherry flavor is invented and added to regular flavors.\u2022 1935: The original Five Flavor roll of Life Savers debuted.\u2022 1956: Life Savers Limited merged with Beech-Nut.\u2022 1968: Beech-Nut Life Savers merged with Squibb.\u2022 1981: Nabisco Brands Inc. acquired Life Savers from the E.R. Squibb Corporation.\u2022 1987: Canadian Life Savers business acquired by Hershey Canada.\u2022 1992: Life Savers Gummies launches in three varieties: Grape, Five Flavor, and Mixed Berry.\u2022 1996: Canadian Life Savers business acquired by Beta Brands Limited.\u2022 2000: Kraft acquires Nabisco.\u2022 2001: Kraft acquires Canadian Life Savers business from Beta Brands.\u2022 2004: Life Savers business acquired by Wrigley's.\u2022 2008: Mars acquires Wrigley.\u2022 .
